K02sspp2_4u:2: atha khalu śakro devāṇām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:3: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac ceyaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇanto
K02sspp2_4u:4: dhārayanto vācayantaḥ paryavāpnuvanto yoniśaś ca manasikurvanta iha dhārmikān guṇān
K02sspp2_4u:7: buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsīnāḥ yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣanti tān buddhān bhagavataḥ
K02sspp2_4u:8: satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tān yeṣāṃ kuśalamūlāni samṛdhyanti yac ca
K02sspp2_4u:9: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇvati sa tāvan na vipramuṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:13: janmasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti parivārasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti,
K02sspp2_4u:15: cakṣuḥsaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti svarasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti samādhisaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti
K02sspp2_4u:16: dhāraṇīsaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti upāyakauśalyena cātmānaṃ buddhavigraham abhinirmāya
K02sspp2_4u:18: yatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anutpādaḥ prādurbhāvo nāsti,
K02sspp2_4u:19: te tatra gatvā dānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante,
K02sspp2_4u:66: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. upāyakauśalyena ca sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti triṣu ca yāneṣu sattvān vinayanti,
K02sspp2_4u:68: atha śakro devānām indraḥ punar bhagavantam etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:69: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac cedaṃ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti.
K02sspp2_4u:118: evam ukte bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:120: prajñāpāramitayā kauśika parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti.
K02sspp2_4u:171: punar aparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā dhārayitayā vācitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā yāṅ guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭidhārmikān parigṛhṇāti,
K02sspp2_4u:172: tāṃc chṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:173: evaṃ bhagavann iti śakro devānām indro bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt,
K02sspp2_4u:175: yo hi kaścit kauśika anyatīrthikacarakaparivrājako māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā adhimānikā
K02sspp2_4u:176: vā pudgalā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vigrahītukāmā bhaviṣyanti vivecayitukamā bhaviṣyanti
K02sspp2_4u:177: vivaditukāmā bhaviṣyanti virodhayitukāmā bhaviṣyanti teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivecayitukamānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:180: teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ te 'bhiprāyā na paripūrayiṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:181: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dīrgharātraṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:182: caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caratā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caratā
K02sspp2_4u:184: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādān āpadyante,
K02sspp2_4u:185: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate sattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:186: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauḥśīlyam āpadyante,
K02sspp2_4u:187: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate sattvāḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:188: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ krodhavyāpādavihiṃsā āpadyante,
K02sspp2_4u:191: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kausīdyam āpadyante,
K02sspp2_4u:192: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate sattvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:193: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vikṣepam āpadyate,
K02sspp2_4u:194: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate satttvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:195: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauṣprajñām āpadyante,
K02sspp2_4u:196: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate satttvāḥ prajñānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:197: yeṣāṃ kṛte kauśika sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsāranti yad utānuśayaparyutthāne na tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenopāyakauśalena,
K02sspp2_4u:198: teṣāṃ sattvānām anuśayaparyutthānaṃ vigṛhyate sattvāś caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāś
K02sspp2_4u:199: caturṣv apramāṇeṣu samādāpitāś catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu samādāpitā pañcasv abhijñāsu
K02sspp2_4u:200: samādāpitāḥ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu amādāpitāś caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu samādāpitāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:201: caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu samāpitāḥ pañcasv indriyeṣu samādāpitāḥ pañcasu baleṣu samādāpitāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:202: saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu samādāpitāḥ āryāṣṭāṅge mārge samādāpitāś caturṣv āryasatyeṣu samādāpitāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:203: navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ sarvasamādhiṣu samādāpitāḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu samādāpitāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:204: daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu samādāpitāḥ caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:214: ime te kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ caratā dṛṣṭadhārmikā na guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:215: saṃparāye cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvānyathāpratiṣṭhāne pratiṣṭhāpyānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyati.
K02sspp2_4u:216: ime kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sāṃparāyikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:218: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
K02sspp2_4u:220: na tatra pṛthivīpradeśe māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā anyatīrthikā vā parivrājakā
K02sspp2_4u:221: ādhimānika vā pudgalāḥ śakṣyanty asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vigrahāya vā vivādāya vā
K02sspp2_4u:222: virodhāya vāntardhānāya vā parākramitum uttare ca teṣāṃ guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:223: yadāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇagrahaṇabhāvanābhir anupūrveṇa tribhir yānair niryāya
K02sspp2_4u:225: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika maghinām auṣadhīḥ sarvaviṣapraśamaṇī tatrāśīviṣeṇa vā jantunā
K02sspp2_4u:226: vā kṣudhābhibhūtenāhārānveṣiṇā kiṃcid eva prāṇijātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavet. sa tat prāṇakajātaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:227: khāditukāmatayānugacchet. atha tat prāṇakajātaṃ maraṇabhayabhītaṃ yena sā maghī nām'
K02sspp2_4u:228: auṣadhis tenopasaṃkrāman tataḥ sa āśīviṣas tasyā auṣadhyā gandhenaiva pratyudāvartitavyaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:230: tathā hi tasyā auṣadhyā bhaiṣajyaguṇo yaṃ tasyāśīviṣasya tad viṣam abhibhavaty eva balavatī hi kauśika sā maghī auṣadhiḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:231: evam eva kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca
K02sspp2_4u:232: tatra kauśika ya utpannotpannā vigrahavivādavirodhā bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:233: te prajñāpāramitāyās tejasā prajñāpāramitāyā balena kṣipram evāntardhāsyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:237: tathā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarveṣāṃ pāpakānāṃ dharmāṇām upaśamayitrī na vivardhikā yad uta rāgadveṣamohāṇām upaśamayitrī na vivardhikā.
K02sspp2_4u:251: yāvat kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasyopaśamayitri na vivardhikā,
K02sspp2_4u:344: eteṣāṃ kauśika sarvesāṃ mārakāyikānāṃ dharmāṇām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitopaśamayitrī na vivardhikā,
K02sspp2_4u:345: yāvanta kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraś ca devānām
K02sspp2_4u:346: indro brahmānaś ca sahāpatiḥ ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devāḥ śuddhāvāso devāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:347: te sarve tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:348: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:350: sa punar akuśalebhayaś ca dharmebhyaḥ parihāsyate,
K02sspp2_4u:353: yad uta dānapāramitayā vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyate 'nupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_4u:405: sa ādeyavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati mitavacanas ca bhaviṣyati na ca vikīrṇavacano bhaviṣyati na krodhābhibhūto bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:415: parāṃś cādattādānavairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati. adattādānavairamaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
K02sspp2_4u:418: ātmanā ca kāmamithyācārāt prativirato bhaviṣyati. parāṃś ca kāmamithyācāravairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati kāmamithyācāraviramaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
K02sspp2_4u:421: ātmanā ca mṛṣāvādāt prativirato bhaviṣyati. parāṃś ca mṛṣāvādavairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati mṛṣāvādavairamaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
K02sspp2_4u:426: paiśunyavairamaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyati, ye cānye (ŚsP_II-4_11)
K02sspp2_4u:488: ye cānye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:492: ye cānye bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:496: ye cānye 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:500: ye cānye śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:504: ye cānye mahāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:508: ye cānye paramārthaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:512: ye cānye saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:516: ye cānye 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:520: ye cānye 'tyantaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:524: ye cānye 'navarāgraśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:528: ye cānye 'navakāraśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:532: ye cānye prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:536: ye cānye sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:540: ye cānye svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:544: ye cānye 'nupalambhaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:548: ye cānye 'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:552: ye cānye svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:556: ye cānye 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:558: ātmanā ca sarvasamādhīn samāpatsyate parāṃś ca sarvasamādhisamāpattau samādāpayiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:560: ye cānye sarvasamādhīn samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:564: ye cānye dhāraṇīpratilambhā bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:569: ye cānye prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:573: ye cānye dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:577: ye cānye tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:581: ye cānye caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:585: ye cānye mahāmaitrī samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:589: ye cānye karuṇā samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:593: ye cānye muditāṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:597: ye cānye upekṣāṃ samāpatsyate teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:601: ye cānye ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:605: ye cānye vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:609: ye cānye ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati (ŚsP_II-4_15)
K02sspp2_4u:614: ye cānye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:618: ye cānye smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:622: ye cānye samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:626: ye cānye ṛddhipādān bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:630: ye cānye pañcendriyāṇi bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:702: ātmanā ca mārgākārajñatāṃ paripūrayiṣyati, parāṃś ca
K02sspp2_4u:714: sa ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yad dānaṃ dāsyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_4u:715: yac chīlaṃ rakṣiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_4u:716: yāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_4u:717: yad vīryaṃ ārapsyate tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_4u:718: yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_4u:719: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_4u:720: evaṃ carataḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu smṛtir utpatsyate,
K02sspp2_4u:721: saced dānaṃ na dāsyāmi durgateṣu kuleṣūpapatsya na ca me sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ pratilapsye,
K02sspp2_4u:722: sacet chīlaṃ na rakṣiṣyāmi tisṛṣu me durgatīṣūpapattir bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:724: na sattvaparipāko na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ pratilapsye,
K02sspp2_4u:726: indriyāṇi me paribhetsyate mukhamaṇḍalaṃ me dhyāmībhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:728: yayā rūpasaṃpadayā bodhisattvacārikāḥ carataḥ sattvasahadarśane naiva niyatā bhaviṣyanty
K02sspp2_4u:729: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na ca rūpasaṃpadā sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi na buddhakṣetraṃ
K02sspp2_4u:731: sacet kusīdo bhaviṣyati nemaṃ śakṣyāmi bodhimārgam anuprāptaṃ na ca me sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:732: na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñataṃ pratilapsye,
K02sspp2_4u:733: saced vikṣiptacitto bhaviṣyāmi nedaṃ śaksyāmi samādhim utpādayituṃ yena samādhinā
K02sspp2_4u:734: sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi na me buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ bhaviṣyāmi na sarvākārajñatām
K02sspp2_4u:736: duṣprajño bhaviṣyāmi na śakṣyāmi prajñopāyakauśalena śrāvakabhūmipratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sarvākārajñatām anuprāptuṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:738: ayuktam etad bhaved yo māṃ mātsaryavaśena dānapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ dauḥśīlyavaśena
K02sspp2_4u:739: śīlapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ vyāpadavaśena kṣāntipāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ kauśīdyavaśena
K02sspp2_4u:740: vīryapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ vikṣepavaśena dhyānapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ dauṣprajñāvaśena
K02sspp2_4u:742: aparipūrayan dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na niryāsyāmi sarvākārajñatāyām.
K02sspp2_4u:743: evaṃ khalu kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikāṃś ca sāṃparāyikāṃś ca guṇānuśaṃsān pratilapsyate,
K02sspp2_4u:744: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:747: śakra āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā.
K02sspp2_4u:749: yathā punaḥ kauśika bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāparidamanārthāyānunnamārthāya ca pratyupasthitā.
K02sspp2_4u:750: śakra āha: iha bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyaś ca dānaṃ dadāti,
K02sspp2_4u:751: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:752: śrāvakebhyaś ca sa kṛpaṇavanīyakārthena yācanakebhyaś ca sa tena dānenānupāyakauśalenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:754: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:756: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:758: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:759: laukikyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ. evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:761: carataḥ, evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi,
K02sspp2_4u:764: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:766: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:768: evaṃ bhavaty aham ṛddhipādān bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:770: evaṃ bhavaty aham indriyāṇi bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:772: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ balāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:774: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:776: evaṃ bhavaty aham āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:778: evaṃ bhavaty aham āryasatyāṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:780: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:782: evaṃ bhavaty aham apramāṇāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:784: evaṃ bhavaty aham ārūpyasamāpattir bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:786: evaṃ bhavaty aham ārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:788: evaṃ bhavaty aham anupūrvavihārasamāpattīr bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:790: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:792: evaṃ bhavaty aham abhijñāṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:794: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ samādhīn bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati.
K02sspp2_4u:795: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sarvadhāraṇīḥ pratilapsye sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:796: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ daśatathāgatabalāni bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:798: bhavaty ahaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyāni bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:799: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidā bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:800: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ mahākaruṇāṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:801: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:802: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:803: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:804: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati.
K02sspp2_4u:805: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikeṣu dharmeṣu caran unnāmaṃ gacchaty
K02sspp2_4u:806: ahaṃkārābhiniveśena tasya prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāya nānunnāmārthāya pratyupasthitā bhavati.
K02sspp2_4u:808: iha punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lokottarāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvān
K02sspp2_4u:809: na dāyakam upalabhate na dānam upalabhate na pratigrāhakam upalabhate. evaṃ khalu
K02sspp2_4u:810: bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya
K02sspp2_4u:812: sa lokottarāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāc chīlaṃ nopalabhyate
K02sspp2_4u:813: śīlaṃ nopalabhyate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:814: carataḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati,
K02sspp2_4u:815: sa lokottarāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate
K02sspp2_4u:816: kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:817: carataḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati,
K02sspp2_4u:818: sa lokottarāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvād vīryaṃ nopalabhyate
K02sspp2_4u:819: vīryavaṃ taṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:821: sa lokottarāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitā subhāvitatvād dhyānaṃ nopalabhate dhyānaṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan (ŚsP_II-4_21)
K02sspp2_4u:822: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāparidamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati,
K02sspp2_4u:823: sa lokottarāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt prajñāṃ nopalabhate
K02sspp2_4u:824: prajñāṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:825: carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
K02sspp2_4u:826: sa smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:827: sa samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:828: sa ṛddhipādān bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:829: sa indriyāṇi bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:830: sa balāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:831: sa bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:832: sa āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:833: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya
K02sspp2_4u:834: ca pratyupasthitā bhavati. sa āryasatyāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:835: sa dhyānāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:837: sa ārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:838: sa vimokṣā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsu bhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:840: sa śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:842: sa samādhīn bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:843: sa dhāraṇīmukhāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt. evaṃ khalu
K02sspp2_4u:846: sa tathāgatabalāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:847: sa vaiśāradyāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:848: sa pratisaṃvido bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:849: sa mahāmaitrīṃ bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:850: sa mahākaruṇā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:851: sa āveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt. (ŚsP_II-4_22)
K02sspp2_4u:852: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyā prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
K02sspp2_4u:853: sa sarvajñatā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:854: sa mārgākārajñatā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
K02sspp2_4u:855: sa sarvākārajñatā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt. evaṃ khalu
K02sspp2_4u:860: atha khalu bhagavāñ chakro devānām indram etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:861: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati svādhyāpayiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:864: tatra sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyann avataret,
K02sspp2_4u:865: tatrāvatīrya tiṣṭheta nāsau kulaputro vā kuladuhitā yā parājayaṃ yāsyati,
K02sspp2_4u:866: jaya evāsya bhaviṣyaty akṣataś cānupahataś ca taṃ saṃgrāmam uttariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:867: asthānaṃ kauśikānavakāśo yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃs tatra saṃgrāme samabhirūḍho jīvitāntarāyaṃ nigacchen nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
K02sspp2_4u:868: sacet punar asya kaścid eva śastraṃ vā kāṇḍaṃ vā śarīre kṣipet na tasya śarīre patiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:869: tathā hi tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā dīrgharātraṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā,
K02sspp2_4u:870: ātmanaś ca rāgaśastrāṇi rāgakāṇḍāni nirjitāni pareṣāṃ rāgaśastrāṇi rāgakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni,
K02sspp2_4u:871: ātmanaś ca dveṣaśastrāṇi dveṣakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ dveṣaśastrāṇi dveṣakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
K02sspp2_4u:872: ātmanaś ca mohaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ mohaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
K02sspp2_4u:873: ātmanaś ca dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ ca dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
K02sspp2_4u:874: ātmanaś ca paryutthānaśastrāṇi paryutthānakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ ca paryutthānaśastrāṇi paryutthānakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
K02sspp2_4u:875: ātmanaś cānuśayaśastrāṇy anuśayakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ cānuśayaśastrāṇy anuśayakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
K02sspp2_4u:876: imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya tāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatāṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:877: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā saṃgrāmamadhyagatasya śastrāṇi vā kāṇḍāni vā kṣiptāni śarīre na nipatiṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:878: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:879: sarvajñatācittena cāvirahito bhaviṣyati. tasya kaścid abhaiṣajyam avakiret kākhordaṃ vā kuryād agnikhadā copanāmayet,
K02sspp2_4u:880: śastreṇa vā dadyād viṣaṃ vā dadyād udake cainaṃ chorayet sarvaṃ tat tasya na kramiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:881: mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā, (ŚsP_II-4_24)
K02sspp2_4u:882: niruttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:883: atra ca vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇeḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate na paravyābādhāya cetayate nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate. tat kasya
K02sspp2_4u:884: tathā hi so 'tra śikṣamāṇo nātmānam upalabhate na sattvam upalabhate na jīvam upalabhate
K02sspp2_4u:885: na jantum upalabhate na poṣam upalabhate na puruṣam upalabhate na pudgalam upalabhate
K02sspp2_4u:886: na manujam upalabhate na mānavam upalabhate na kārakam upalabhate na vedakaṃ upalabhate
K02sspp2_4u:887: na jānakam upalabhate na paśyakam upalabhate.
K02sspp2_4u:995: anupalambhamāno nātmavyābādhāya cetayate na paravyābādhāya cetayate nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate,
K02sspp2_4u:997: sarvasattvānāṃ cittāni vyavalokayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:998: atra vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
K02sspp2_4u:999: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py atra vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K02sspp2_4u:1000: ye 'pi te etarhi pratyutpanne 'dhvani daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1001: te 'py atraiva vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
K02sspp2_4u:1003: punar aparaṃ kauśika yatremāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyate udgṛhīṣyati na svādhyāpayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na paryavāpsyate na yoniśo
K02sspp2_4u:1004: na punar tatra gṛhe vā grāme vā nagare vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vāvatāraprekṣāvatāraṃ lapsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1005: tathā hy asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjārthāya ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
K02sspp2_4u:1006: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā devaputrā yāmā devaputrāḥ tuṣitā devaputrā
K02sspp2_4u:1007: nirmāṇaratayo devaputrāḥ paranirmitavasavartino devaputrā brahmakāyikā devaputrā
K02sspp2_4u:1008: brahmapurohitā devaputrā brahmapārṣadyā devaputrā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā
K02sspp2_4u:1009: devāḥ apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā
K02sspp2_4u:1010: devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā
K02sspp2_4u:1011: abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devā ye 'py aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu
K02sspp2_4u:1012: lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā devaputrāḥ yāmā devaputrās
K02sspp2_4u:1013: tuṣitā devaputrā nirmāṇaratayo devaputrāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devaputrā brahmakāyikā
K02sspp2_4u:1014: devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā
K02sspp2_4u:1015: devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā
K02sspp2_4u:1016: devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā
K02sspp2_4u:1017: abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1020: te ca devaputrā āgatyaināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā gamiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:1021: yaḥ kaścit kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyati tasyeme dṛṣṭadhārmikā
K02sspp2_4u:1022: guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti. tad yathāpi nāma kauśika ye kecid bodhimaṇḍe gatā bodhimaṇḍasya
K02sspp2_4u:1023: ca parisāmantagate na bodhimaṇḍasya cābhyantare tiryagyonigatāḥ prāṇinā manuṣyabhūtā
K02sspp2_4u:1024: vā na te śakyante manuṣyeṇa vā amanuṣyeṇa vā viheṭhayituṃ vā vihiṃsayituṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1025: atra hi niṣadya taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
K02sspp2_4u:1026: abhisaṃbuddhā. ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
K02sspp2_4u:1029: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti te 'py atraiva niṣadyānuttarāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1030: samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. taiḥ sarvatathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair
K02sspp2_4u:1032: pratipadyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā devamānuṣīṣu saṃpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyante pratiṣṭhāpyante ca,
K02sspp2_4u:1037: pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyante pratiṣṭhāpyante ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1038: anayaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitayā sa pṛthivīpradeśe sarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūtaḥ kṛto
K02sspp2_4u:1039: vandanīyo namaskaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyaḥ puṣpair dhūpair
K02sspp2_4u:1040: mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1042: śakra āha: yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
K02sspp2_4u:1043: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhāraya tāṃ ca puṣpair dhūpair mālyair
K02sspp2_4u:1044: gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed,
K02sspp2_4u:1045: yaś ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya saptaratnamayastūpe tathāgataśarīrāni
K02sspp2_4u:1046: pratiṣṭhāpayet parihared vā saptaratnamaye samudgate kṛtvā tāni ca satkuryād gurukurād
K02sspp2_4u:1047: mānayet pūjayet puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
K02sspp2_4u:1051: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pariprakṣyāmi,
K02sspp2_4u:1052: yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuru. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:1053: kauśika yeyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā yaś cāyam
K02sspp2_4u:1054: ātmabhāvo 'bhinivartitaḥ. katamasyāṃ pratipati śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena
K02sspp2_4u:1056: śakra āha: ihaiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinivartitaḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1062: tathāgatas tathāgata iti saṃkhyāgacchati. sarvākārajñatāpratilambhena tu tathāgatas tathāgata iti. saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
K02sspp2_4u:1063: yeyaṃ kauśika sarvākārajñatā sā prajñāpāramitā niryātā,
K02sspp2_4u:1064: evam ayaṃ kauśikātmabhāvas tasya sarvākarajñatājñānasyāśrayabhūta imaṃ cāśrayaṃ niśritya
K02sspp2_4u:1065: tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā evaṃ tasya sarvākārajñatājñānasyāyam
K02sspp2_4u:1066: ātmabhāva āśrayabhūtasarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūto vandanīyo mānanīyo pūjanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo
K02sspp2_4u:1067: gurukaraṇīyaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ parinivṛtasyāpi ca kauśika śarīrāny evaṃ śarīrapūjā bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1068: na tv anyathadharmapūjāḥ yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1069: likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati
K02sspp2_4u:1071: puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1072: sarvākārajñatājñānasya tena pūjākṛto bhaviṣyati. tasmāt tarhi kauśika śrāddhena kulaputreṇa
K02sspp2_4u:1073: vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgataṃ pūjayitukāmena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā likhitvodgrahītavyā
K02sspp2_4u:1074: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:1075: satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyāḥ puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair
K02sspp2_4u:1076: vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ yaś ca kauśika tathāgatasya
K02sspp2_4u:1078: saptaratnamaye vā samugate kṛtvā pariharet tataś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:1079: pūjayet puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1080: patākābhiḥ yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyād
K02sspp2_4u:1081: yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt tāṃ ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair dhūpair
K02sspp2_4u:1082: mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ. ayam
K02sspp2_4u:1083: eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1170: ato niryātās tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvākārajñatā.
K02sspp2_4u:1172: śakra āha: ime bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na satkurvanti
K02sspp2_4u:1173: na gurukurvanti na mānayanti na pūjayanti tat kiṃ te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā na jānanty
K02sspp2_4u:1176: kauśikāyaṃ jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye dharma abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
K02sspp2_4u:1177: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā dharme niṣkāṅkṣā saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1178: ye buddhe niṣṭhāṅgatā dharme niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ saṃghe niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1179: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā,
K02sspp2_4u:1181: ye dharme abhedyaprasādena samanvāgato ye saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
K02sspp2_4u:1182: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā dharme niṣkāṅkṣāḥ saṃghe niṣkāṅksāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1183: ye buddhe niṣṭhāṅgatā dharme niṣṭhāṅgatā saṃghe niṣṭhāṅgatā.
K02sspp2_4u:1186: kauśika kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1187: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1188: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1189: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1190: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1191: kiyantas te jambūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1192: kiyantas te jāmbūdvipakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1193: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1194: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1195: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1196: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1197: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1198: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvā ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ tato 'lpakā ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinas
K02sspp2_4u:1199: tato 'lpakā ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinaḥ tato 'lpakā ye na vānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1202: tato 'lpakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannās
K02sspp2_4u:1203: tato 'lpatarakā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminas tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānām
K02sspp2_4u:1204: acalabhāgīyānā saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1205: prahāṇād arhatas tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1206: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1208: evam etat kauśikaivam etad 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
K02sspp2_4u:1211: tato 'lpatarakā ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā dharme niṣkāṅkṣāḥ saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1212: tato 'lpatarakā ye buddhe niṣṭhāṅgatā dharme niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ saṃghe niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1213: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1214: tato 'lpatarakā ye srotaāpannās tato 'lpatarakā ye sakṛdāgāminas tato 'lpatarakā
K02sspp2_4u:1215: ye anāgāminas tato 'lpatarakā ye 'rhantaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitās
K02sspp2_4u:1216: tato 'lpatarakā ye 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās tato 'lpatarakā ye bodhaye
K02sspp2_4u:1218: tathā hi pūrvantaiḥ saṃsāre saṃsaradbhiḥ na buddhādṛṣṭo na dharmaśrana saṃghaḥ paryupāsito
K02sspp2_4u:1219: na dānaṃ dattaṃ na śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ na kṣāntiṃ bhāvitā na vīryam ālabdhaṃ na dhyānāni
K02sspp2_4u:1271: tad anena te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1272: alpakās te jāmbūdvīpakā sattvā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā dharme abhedyprasādena samanvāgatā saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1278: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1279: tato 'lpatarakā ye rāgadvesamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1280: tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1281: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1283: tato 'lpatarakā ye bodhaye athyāsayena caranti niṣṭhatu kauśika manuṣyāḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:1284: kauśika kiyanto jāmbūdvīpe prāṇināye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhino ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhino ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhino ye navānām (ŚsP_II-4_33)
K02sspp2_4u:1285: anupūrvavihārasamāpattīr lābhino ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhino ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1286: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāmino ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1288: ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ kiyants te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1289: samyaksaṃbodhau niṣkāṅkṣā buddhe dharme saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1290: prāṇino ye mātṛjñāḥ ye pitṛjñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ kule jyeṣṭopacāyakā dānāni dadati śīlaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1294: anātmasaṃjñino 'śucisaṃjñinaḥ sarvalokeṣv anabhirati saṃjñanaḥ kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1296: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1304: ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1305: ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1306: ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitā alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1310: alpakās te kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1313: ye navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhino ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1316: ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāmino ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1321: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K02sspp2_4u:1322: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1325: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhatuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K02sspp2_4u:1326: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭhante yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1329: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K02sspp2_4u:1330: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1333: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K02sspp2_4u:1334: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1337: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadlvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
K02sspp2_4u:1338: prajñāparamitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe
K02sspp2_4u:1339: te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya
K02sspp2_4u:1343: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
K02sspp2_4u:1344: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1347: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
K02sspp2_4u:1348: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1351: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
K02sspp2_4u:1352: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1355: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K02sspp2_4u:1356: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1359: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K02sspp2_4u:1360: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭhate yad bhūyastvena (ŚsP_II-4_36)
K02sspp2_4u:1361: śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1364: tasmāt tarhi kauśika ye te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K02sspp2_4u:1365: saṃprasthitās taiḥ kṣipraṃ sukhaṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukamair iyaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1367: yoniśaś ca manasikartavyāḥ. tair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya yoniśaś ca manasikṛtvā,
K02sspp2_4u:1369: tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
K02sspp2_4u:1374: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:1375: pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ catvāry āryasatyāni catvāri dhyānāni
K02sspp2_4u:1376: catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1377: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni pañcābhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni
K02sspp2_4u:1378: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ mahāmaitri mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1379: anye 'py aparimāṇā buddhadharmā yatra prajñāpāramitāyām antargatā te py udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1380: tathā hi kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caivaṃ jñāsyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:1381: atra hi tathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ śikṣito yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1387: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañceṣv indriyeṣu
K02sspp2_4u:1388: pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu āryāṣṭāṅge mārge caturṣv āryasatyeṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu
K02sspp2_4u:1389: caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu
K02sspp2_4u:1390: triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu
K02sspp2_4u:1391: tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1394: asmābhir apy anuśikṣitavyam eṣāsmākaṃ śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:1395: yāvad anye 'py aparimāṇā buddhadharmā etad buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsanaṃ pratyekabuddhānām
K02sspp2_4u:1396: arhatām anāgāmināṃ sakṛdāgāmināṃ srotaāpannānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1397: śikṣamāṇā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1444: buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhā arhanto 'nāgāminaḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ srotaāpannāḥ pāraṅgatā gacchanti gamiṣyanti ca.
K02sspp2_4u:1446: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā tiṣṭhati tathāgataparinirvṛte vā tathāgate,
K02sspp2_4u:1447: prajñāpāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1448: eṣaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1449: dhyānapāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1450: eṣaiva kauśika dhyānapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1451: vīryapāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1452: eṣaiva kauśika vīryapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1453: kṣāntipāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1454: eṣaiva kauśika kṣāntipāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurayāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1455: śīlapāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1456: eṣaiva kauśika śīlapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1457: dānapāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1458: eṣaiva kauśika dānapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratisaraṇam.
K02sspp2_4u:1459: adhyātmaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1460: eṣaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1461: bahirdhāśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1462: eṣaiva kauśika bahirdhāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1463: pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ. adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyataiva
K02sspp2_4u:1465: eṣaiva kauśikādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1468: eṣaiva kauśika śūnyatāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1469: mahāśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1470: eṣaiva kauśika mahāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1471: paramārthaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1472: eṣaiva kauśika paramārthaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1473: saṃskṛtaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1474: eṣaiva kauśika saṃskṛtaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1475: asaṃskṛtaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1476: eṣaiva kauśikāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1477: atyantaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1478: eṣaiva kauśika atyantaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1479: anavarāgraśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1480: eṣaiva kauśika anavarāgraśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1481: anavakāraśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1482: eṣaiva kauśika anavakāraśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1483: prakṛtiśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1484: eṣaiva kauśika prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1485: sarvadharmaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1486: eṣaiva kauśika sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1487: svalakṣaṇaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1488: eṣaiva kauśika svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1491: eṣaiva kauśikānupalambhaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1492: abhāvaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1493: eṣaiva kauśikābhāvaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇam,
K02sspp2_4u:1494: svabhāvaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1495: eṣaiva kauśika svabhāvaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1496: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1497: eṣaiva kauśikābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1498: smṛtyupasthānāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1499: etāny eva kauśika smṛtyupasthānāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1500: samyakprahāṇāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1501: etāny eva kauśika samyakprahāṇāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1502: ṛddhipādā eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1503: eta eva kauśika ṛddhipādāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1504: indriyāṇy eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1505: etāny eva kauśikendriyāṇi sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1506: balāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1507: etāny eva kauśika balāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1508: bodhyaṅgāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1509: etāny eva kauśika bodhyaṅgāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1510: āryāṣṭāṅgamārga eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1511: eṣa eva kauśikāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ (ŚsP_II-4_41)
K02sspp2_4u:1513: āryasatyāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1514: etāny eva kauśikāryasatyāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaranaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1515: dhyānāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1516: etāny eva kauśika dhyānāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1517: apramāṇāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1518: etāny eva kauśikāpramāṇāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1519: ārūpyasamāpattaya eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1520: eta eva kauśika ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1521: vimokṣā eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1522: eta eva kauśika vimokṣāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1523: anupūrvavihārasamāpattaya eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1524: etā eva kauśikānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyālḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1525: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1526: etāny eva kauśika śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1527: abhijñā eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1528: etā eva kauśikābhijñā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1529: samādhaya eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1530: eta eva kauśika samādhayaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1531: dhāraṇīmukhāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1532: etāny eva kauśika dhāraṇīmukhāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1533: tathāgatabalāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1535: tathāgatabalāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1536: vaiśāradyāny eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1537: etāny eva kauśika vaiśāradyāni sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1538: pratisaṃvida eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1539: etā eva kauśika pratisaṃvidaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1540: mahākaruṇā eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1541: eṣaiva kauśika mahākaruṇā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1542: āveṇikabuddhadharmā eva taiḥ pratisatkartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1543: eta eva kauśika āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1544: sarvajñataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1545: etā eva kauśika sarvajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:1546: mārgākārajñataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1547: etā eva kauśika mārgākārajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1548: sarvākārajñataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1549: etā eva kauśika sarvākārajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1551: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1552: stūpaṃ kārayed yojanamuccaitvenārdhayojanaṃ vistareṇāyāṃ yāvaj jīvaṃ divyaiś puṣpair
K02sspp2_4u:1553: divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair
K02sspp2_4u:1554: divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyair vādyaiḥ satkuryā
K02sspp2_4u:1555: gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:1556: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:1557: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K02sspp2_4u:1559: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ (ŚsP_II-4_43)
K02sspp2_4u:1560: puṇyaṃ prasavati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati parebhyaś ca vistareṇa
K02sspp2_4u:1561: avirahitaś ca sarvākārajñatācittena bhaviṣyaty uttare ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati
K02sspp2_4u:1562: mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
K02sspp2_4u:1564: tiṣṭhantu kauśikaikaḥ stūpaḥ sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataparinirvṛte,
K02sspp2_4u:1565: imaṃ jāmbūdvīpaṃ saptaratnamayais stūpaiḥ paripūraye yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistātais
K02sspp2_4u:1566: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair
K02sspp2_4u:1567: mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair
K02sspp2_4u:1568: vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:1569: kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:1570: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K02sspp2_4u:1572: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K02sspp2_4u:1573: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1575: uttare ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1577: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ cāturmahādvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate
K02sspp2_4u:1578: parinirvṛte pūjayaiḥ saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais
K02sspp2_4u:1579: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyair puṣpair divyair
K02sspp2_4u:1580: mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair
K02sspp2_4u:1581: vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:1582: kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:1583: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K02sspp2_4u:1585: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1586: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1587: likhitvā nu satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair (ŚsP_II-4_44)
K02sspp2_4u:1588: gandhair vilepanaiś curṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1589: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturmahādvīpako lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ. sacet kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:1590: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ cūḍikaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte
K02sspp2_4u:1591: pūjāyai saptaratnamayais stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais
K02sspp2_4u:1592: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyair puṣpair divyair
K02sspp2_4u:1593: mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair
K02sspp2_4u:1594: vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:1595: kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:1596: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K02sspp2_4u:1598: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1599: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1601: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1602: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasracūḍiko lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ. sacet kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:1603: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ madhyamaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte
K02sspp2_4u:1604: pūjāyai saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais
K02sspp2_4u:1605: tāṃś ca yāvat kṣīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair
K02sspp2_4u:1606: mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair
K02sspp2_4u:1607: vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:1608: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:1609: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K02sspp2_4u:1611: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1612: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1614: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1615: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ. sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgate parinirvṛte (ŚsP_II-4_45)
K02sspp2_4u:1616: pūjāyai imaṃ trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyair saptaratnamayais
K02sspp2_4u:1617: tathāgatacaityaiḥ paripūjayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais tāṃś ca satkuryād
K02sspp2_4u:1618: gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair
K02sspp2_4u:1619: vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1620: patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:1621: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:1623: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K02sspp2_4u:1625: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1626: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1628: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1629: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasro mahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇo ye kecit
K02sspp2_4u:1630: kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte
K02sspp2_4u:1631: pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayet tāṃ ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:1632: pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś
K02sspp2_4u:1633: cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1634: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1636: tāṃś ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1637: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:1638: śakra āha: evam etad bhagavan evam etat sugata prajñāpāramitā bhagavan satkurvadbhiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1639: gurukurvadbhir mānayadbhiḥ pūjayadbhir atītānagatapratyutpannās tathāgatā arhantaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1640: samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ satkṛto gurukṛto mānito pūjito bhavanti,
K02sspp2_4u:1641: yāvantaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas
K02sspp2_4u:1642: tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na
K02sspp2_4u:1643: yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed
K02sspp2_4u:1645: divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1646: yāvanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas
K02sspp2_4u:1647: tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na
K02sspp2_4u:1648: yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed
K02sspp2_4u:1649: divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair
K02sspp2_4u:1650: divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1651: yāvantaḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas
K02sspp2_4u:1652: tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na
K02sspp2_4u:1653: yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed
K02sspp2_4u:1654: divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair
K02sspp2_4u:1655: divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1656: yāvanta uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas
K02sspp2_4u:1657: tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na
K02sspp2_4u:1658: yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed
K02sspp2_4u:1659: divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair
K02sspp2_4u:1660: divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1661: yāvanta uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1662: sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccaistve
K02sspp2_4u:1663: nārdhayojanaṃ vistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:1664: pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś
K02sspp2_4u:1665: cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1666: yāvantaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1667: sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve
K02sspp2_4u:1668: na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:1669: pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś
K02sspp2_4u:1670: cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1671: yāvanto dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1672: sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve
K02sspp2_4u:1673: na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:1674: pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś
K02sspp2_4u:1675: cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1676: yāvantaḥ paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1677: sattvas tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve
K02sspp2_4u:1678: na yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:1679: pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś
K02sspp2_4u:1680: cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1681: yāvanto 'dhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas
K02sspp2_4u:1682: tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na
K02sspp2_4u:1683: yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed
K02sspp2_4u:1684: divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair
K02sspp2_4u:1685: divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1686: yāvanta upariṣṭhād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tata ekaikaḥ sattvas
K02sspp2_4u:1687: tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayāt stūpāt kārayed yojanam uccritve na
K02sspp2_4u:1688: yojanavistāreṇa tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed
K02sspp2_4u:1689: divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair
K02sspp2_4u:1690: divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś
K02sspp2_4u:1692: bhagavan api nu sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1695: śakra āha: ataḥ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K02sspp2_4u:1696: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1698: tāṃś ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1699: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat (ŚsP_II-4_48)
K02sspp2_4u:1701: atra hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyām antargatāḥ sarve kuśalā dharmās tad yathā daśa kuśalaḥ karmapathāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra
K02sspp2_4u:1702: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
K02sspp2_4u:1707: smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:1708: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitā catvāry āryasatyāni duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1709: duḥkhanirodhā mārgaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā aṣṭā vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1710: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K02sspp2_4u:1711: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvajñatā mārgākārajñatā sarvākārajñatā
K02sspp2_4u:1712: idaṃ tad buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsanaṃ yatra sarvaśrāvkapratyekabuddhānām atitānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1713: buddhā bhagavantaḥ śikṣitvā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṅgatā gacchati gamiṣyati ca.
K02sspp2_4u:1716: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānāṃ indram etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:1718: bahu te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyaty aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam acintyam
K02sspp2_4u:1719: atulyam aparimāṇaṃ te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1720: likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
K02sspp2_4u:1722: uttare ca satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:1723: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1724: prajñāpāramitā niryātā hi kauśika tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatā
K02sspp2_4u:1778: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputrā vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1779: likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati
K02sspp2_4u:1781: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
K02sspp2_4u:1782: vividhaiś ca vādyair asya kauśika puṇyābhisaṃskārasyāsau pūrvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1783: śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm
K02sspp2_4u:1784: api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyam api kalām api gaṇanām
K02sspp2_4u:1785: apy upamām apy upaniśam api na kṣamate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1786: yāvat kileyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitā jāṃbūdvīpe sthāsyati. tāvan na buddharatnasyāntardhānaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1787: bhaviṣyati na dharmaratnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃgharatnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1788: tāvad daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1877: pratyekabuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ samudāgaḥ prajñāsyate,
K02sspp2_4u:1883: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā
K02sspp2_4u:1884: yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavasavartinā brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā
K02sspp2_4u:1885: mahābrahmaṇo ābhāḥ parīttabhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:1886: śubhakṛtsnā bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā
K02sspp2_4u:1887: akaniṣṭhā devās taṃ śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate :
K02sspp2_4u:1888: udgṛhītavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā dhārayitavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā vācayitavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā paryavāptavyā mārṣa prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:1890: etayā mārṣa prajñāpāramitayodgṛhītayā dhārayitayā vācayitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā buddhanetryā (ŚsP_II-4_53)
K02sspp2_4u:1891: vācayitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā buddhanetryā avyavacchedo bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:1893: saṃghanetryā avyavacchedo bhaviṣyati buddhanetryā mārṣa avyavacchedo 'nudharmanetryā avyavacchedo 'nusaṃghanetryā avyavacchedaḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1950: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate:
K02sspp2_4u:1951: udgṛhāṇa tvaṃ kauśikemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi yoniśaś ca manasikuruṣvemāṃ prajñāpāramitām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1953: devāṃs trāyastriṃśān yodhayiṣyāmo devais trāyastriṃśaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayiṣyāmas
K02sspp2_4u:1954: tadā tvaṃ kauśikemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhṛtya manasā svadhyāya kuryāḥ yoniśaś
K02sspp2_4u:1955: ca manasikuryā evaṃ teṣām asurāṇāṃ te samudācārāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:1956: punar evāntarddhāsyati na punas te cittotpādā vivardhiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:1957: yeṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ devakanyānāṃ cyutikālaḥ syāṃ te cātmanaḥ pāpopapattiṃ paśyeyus
K02sspp2_4u:1958: teṣāṃ tvaṃ kauśika purataḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃ kuryās te tena prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:1959: śravaṇakuśalamūlena prajñāpāranutā prasādena ca tatraiva devabhavaneṣūpapatsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1960: evaṃ mahārthikā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā śravaṇaṃ yasya kasyacit kulaputrasya vā
K02sspp2_4u:1961: kuladuhitur vā devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotāvabhāsaṃ gamiṣyanti
K02sspp2_4u:1962: sarve te tena kuśalamūlenānupūrveṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1963: tathā hi kauśika ye te 'bhūvan atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sa śrāvakasaṃghās te 'pīhaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K02sspp2_4u:1964: ye 'pi ta etarhi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K02sspp2_4u:1965: sarve te ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1966: tathā hi kauśikātra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarve bodhipakṣā dharmā antargatāḥ śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā buddhadharmā
K02sspp2_4u:1967: śakra āha: mahāvidyeyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā asamasameyaṃ bhagavan vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1971: evam etat kauśikaivam etat mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:1972: asamasameyaṃ vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1973: tathā hi kauśika ye te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
K02sspp2_4u:1974: ta etāṃ vidyām āgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty
K02sspp2_4u:1975: anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py etām eva vidyām āgamyānuttarāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:1977: ye 'pi ta etarhi daśa dig lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti,
K02sspp2_4u:1978: te 'py etām eva vidyām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:1979: tathā hi kauśikemāṃ vidyām āgamya daśakuśalā karmapathāḥ loke prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:2030: āveṇikabuddhadharmā loke prajñāyante. dharmadhātur loke prajñāyate,
K02sspp2_4u:2047: bodhisattvam api kauśikāgamya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ prabhāṣyante. catvāri dhyānāni prabhāvyante,
K02sspp2_4u:2106: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika candramaṇḍalam āgamya sarvoṣadhitārānakṣatrāṇi prabhāvyante.
K02sspp2_4u:2111: yadāpi buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ loke notpādo bhavati,
K02sspp2_4u:2112: tadāpi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvebhyo laukikalokottarān dharmān deśayanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2114: tac ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ prajñāpāramitāniryātaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2115: yenopāyakauśalena samanvāgatā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
K02sspp2_4u:2159: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carati. na ca śrāvakabhūmau patati na pratyekabuddhabhūmisākṣāt karoti,
K02sspp2_4u:2160: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
K02sspp2_4u:2161: āyuḥsaṃpadañ ca parigṛhṇāti sattvasaṃpadañ ca parigṛhṇāti buddhakṣetrasaṃpadañ ca parigṛhṇāti,
K02sspp2_4u:2164: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:2165: sa ebhir dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati sāṃparāyikaiś ca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:2166: śakra āha: katamair bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:2167: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:2169: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:2176: ye ca puna rājakulād upadravā bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:2177: sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:2182: yathāpi tad asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyās tejonubhāvena sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati,
