K02sspp2_4u:2183: tam enaṃ te rājaputrā vā rājamahāmātrā vā priyavacanair ālapitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K02sspp2_4u:2186: tathā hi kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā sarvasattvānām antike maitracittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ karuṇācittaṃ muditācittam upekṣācittaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:2187: ebhiḥ kauśika dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā (ŚsP_II-4_59)
K02sspp2_4u:2188: kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:2189: katamaiś ca kauśika sāṃparāyikair guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati,
K02sspp2_4u:2190: yad uta na jātu daśabhiḥ karmapathair avirahitā bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:2191: na caturbhir dhyānair na caturbhir apramāṇair na catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:2192: na ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir na smṛtyupasthānair na samyakprahāṇair na ṛddhipādair nendriyair
K02sspp2_4u:2193: na balair na bodhyaṅgair na mārgeṇa nāryasatyair na dhyānair nāpramāṇair nārūpyasamāpattibhir
K02sspp2_4u:2195: nābhijñābhir na samādhibhir na dhāraṇīmukhair na tathāgatabalair na vaiśāradyair
K02sspp2_4u:2202: veṇukarakule vā puṣkasakule vā mauṣṭhikacaṇḍālaurānikasaukārikakuleṣu vā śūdrakuleṣu vā satatasamitaṃ dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato
K02sspp2_4u:2203: yatra ca lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhrīyante yāpayanti tatra lokadhātuṣūpapatsyate,
K02sspp2_4u:2204: na jātu bodhisattvābhijñābhir virahito bhaviṣyati. sa ākāṅkṣaṃ buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:2205: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya sa buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāman sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:2207: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā imāṃ guṇasaṃpadām ākāṅkṣadbhir iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgṛhītavyā dhārayitavā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:2209: ta ebhir dṛṣṭadhārmikaiḥ sāṃparāyikaiś ca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:2213: athānyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmaṃ nyāsīt.
K02sspp2_4u:2214: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūd,
K02sspp2_4u:2215: idam anyatīrthikānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma,
K02sspp2_4u:2216: ya nv ahaṃ yāvan mayā bhagavato 'ntikāt,
K02sspp2_4u:2217: itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā udgṛhītaṃ tat svādhyāyaṃ kuryāṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2218: yadi me 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakām upasaṃkramya bhagavato 'ntarāyaṃ ca kuryuḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām.
K02sspp2_4u:2219: atha śakro devānām indro yāvad bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyām udgṛhītaṃ tāvat svādhyāyaṃ karoti sma.
K02sspp2_4u:2220: atha te 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakā dūreṇa dūraṃ bhagavataṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya,
K02sspp2_4u:2221: tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:2223: kim atra kāraṇaṃ yena me 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakā dūreṇa dūraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:2224: atha bhagavān āyuṣmataś chāradvatīputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:2225: parivitarkam ājāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram āmantrayataḥ śakreṇa sāradvatīputra devānām
K02sspp2_4u:2228: tenaiva mārgena tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva prakrāntāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:2229: na hi śāradvatīputra eṣām anyatīrthikacarakaparivrājakānām ekasyāpi śuklāṅgaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
K02sspp2_4u:2230: sarva ete 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakāḥ pratihatacittā upārambhābhiprāyā imāṃ parṣadam upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃyante nāhaṃ taṃ śāradvatīputra samanupaśyāmi,
K02sspp2_4u:2231: sadevaloke samārake sabrahmake saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ yo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:2232: pratihatacitto vā upārambhābhiprāyo vā upasaṃkramen nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2233: tathā hi śāradvatīputra ya iha trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
K02sspp2_4u:2234: devaputrās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devaputrā
K02sspp2_4u:2235: brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmaṇa ābhaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā
K02sspp2_4u:2236: ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubbā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā
K02sspp2_4u:2237: bṛhatphalā anabhrakā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā devāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:2238: ye ca śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye 'pi (ŚsP_II-4_61)
K02sspp2_4u:2239: bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ udgṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2240: tathā hi te prajñāpāramitā niryātāḥ sarvam.
K02sspp2_4u:2241: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye 'pi te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
K02sspp2_4u:2242: buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās
K02sspp2_4u:2243: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2244: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
K02sspp2_4u:2245: ye 'pi te dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:2247: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2248: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
K02sspp2_4u:2249: ye 'pi te paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:2251: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2252: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
K02sspp2_4u:2253: ye 'pi te uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:2255: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2256: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
K02sspp2_4u:2257: ye 'pi te uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:2259: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2260: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
K02sspp2_4u:2261: ye 'pi te pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:2263: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2264: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
K02sspp2_4u:2265: ye 'pi te dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
K02sspp2_4u:2266: devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2267: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
K02sspp2_4u:2268: ye 'pi te paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:2270: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2271: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
K02sspp2_4u:2272: ye 'pi te adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:2274: taiḥ sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitānuparigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2275: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve,
K02sspp2_4u:2276: ye 'pi te upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:2278: taiḥ sarvair iyam prajñāpāramitānugṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2279: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā niryātās te sarve.
K02sspp2_4u:2281: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyas etad abhūd,
K02sspp2_4u:2282: imās tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃmukhībhūtā ime ca
K02sspp2_4u:2283: kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devāḥ saṃmukhībhūtā niḥsaṃśayam atra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākariṣyante,
K02sspp2_4u:2284: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ya nv ahaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrameyaṃ vicakṣuṣ karaṇīya.
K02sspp2_4u:2285: atha māra pāpīyāṃś caturaṅgabalakāyam abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmo 'bhūt.
K02sspp2_4u:2287: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyāṃ caturaṅgabalakāyam abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:2288: yaś cāyaṃ mārapāpīyāñ caturaṅgabalakāyasya vyūho nāyaṃ rājño bimbisārasya caturaṅgasya
K02sspp2_4u:2289: balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyūho na rājñaḥ prasenajito na sākyānāṃ na licchavīnāṃ caturaṅgasya
K02sspp2_4u:2290: balakāyasyaivaṃrūpavyūhaḥ yo 'yaṃ caturaṅgo varakāyo māreṇa pāpiyasā nirmitaḥ dīrgharātraṃ
K02sspp2_4u:2294: prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareyaṃ smṛtyā ca svādhyāyaṃ kuryāt.
K02sspp2_4u:2295: atha śakro devānām indra imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharati sma,
K02sspp2_4u:2297: yathā yathā śakro devānām indra imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃ karoti sma,
K02sspp2_4u:2298: tathā tathā mārapāpīyāṃs tenaiva mārgeṇa tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva pratyudāvartate sma.
K02sspp2_4u:2299: atha tatra parṣadi cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te divyāni puṣpāṇi vāsāṃsi cābhinirmāya vaihāyasy antarikṣe sthitvaiva yena bhagavāṃs tenākṣipanti sma,
K02sspp2_4u:2300: yena bhagavāṃs tenābhiprakiranti sma. evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta,
K02sspp2_4u:2301: ciraṃ bateyaṃ jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhagavatāṃ yāvat kileyaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:2302: jāmbūdvīpakān manuṣyān prajñāpāramitānuvartiṣyante tāvan na tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntardhānaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:2306: yatra ca digbhāge imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ te kulaputrā kuladuhitaro vā likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
K02sspp2_4u:2307: pustakagatām api kṛtvā ālokajātā ca sā dik pratikāṅkṣitavyā sanāthāvigatās tamondhakārā
K02sspp2_4u:2310: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indrakāṃś cākaniṣṭhaparyato devaputrān etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:2313: yāvad imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā anuvartiṣyante,
K02sspp2_4u:2314: tāvat tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati saddharmasya ca
K02sspp2_4u:2315: cirasthitikatā bhaviṣyati saṃgharatnasya ca loke prajñāyate yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasre
K02sspp2_4u:2316: lokadhātau yāvat samanto daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatasyārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:2320: yatra ca digbhāge imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ te kulaputrā kuladuhitaro vā likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
K02sspp2_4u:2321: pustakagatām api kṛtvā ālokajātā ca sā dik pratikāṅkṣitavyā sanāthāvigatās tamondhakārā
K02sspp2_4u:2323: atha te devaputrā punar api divyāni kusumāni abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenābhiprakiranti sma,
K02sspp2_4u:2325: yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati (ŚsP_II-4_64)
K02sspp2_4u:2326: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas manasikariśyati. na tasya māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraprakṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante,
K02sspp2_4u:2327: vayam api bhagavaṃs tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2328: śāstāram eva bhagavaṃs tam asya mahāśāstāram anyataraṃ vā yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
K02sspp2_4u:2330: atha śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:2331: na te bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitaro vā avarakena kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:2332: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
K02sspp2_4u:2334: sarvajinamanasikārās te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:2335: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:2336: bahubuddhaparyupāsitāś ca te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:2337: kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītāś ca te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:2338: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2339: ato hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatā gaveṣitavyā yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:2340: ataś ca punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā gaveṣitavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:2341: yad uta sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2342: tathā hi bhagavan nānyā prajñāpāramitānyā sarvākārajñatānyā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca sarvākārajñatā nānyādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:2344: evam etat kauśikaivam etat prajñāpāramitāniryātā hi kauśika tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvākārajñatā,
K02sspp2_4u:2345: sarvākārajñātāniryātā ca prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2346: tathā hi kauśika nānyā prajñāpāramitānyā sarvākārajñatā nānyā sarvākārajñatānyā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca sarvākārajñatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:2349: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:2350: na tathā bhagavān dānapāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
K02sspp2_4u:2356: na tathā bhagavān adhyātmaśūnyatāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
K02sspp2_4u:2382: yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati. na tathāryasatyānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
K02sspp2_4u:2385: yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati. na tathāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
K02sspp2_4u:2389: yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadḥeyaṃ parikīrtayati. na tathā samādhīnāṃ nāmadheyani parikīrtayati,
K02sspp2_4u:2391: yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati. na tathā daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
K02sspp2_4u:2392: na tatha caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
K02sspp2_4u:2393: na tathā catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
K02sspp2_4u:2396: na tathāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
K02sspp2_4u:2399: prajñāpāramitā ānandaḥ pūrvāṅgamā pariṇāyikā yad uta pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ saptatriṃśānāṃ bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2400: āryasatyānāṃ caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnām
K02sspp2_4u:2402: abhijñānāṃ samādhīnāṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśatathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:2403: pratisaṃvidāṃ mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyā aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:2407: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2410: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ kṣāntiṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2413: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ vīryaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2416: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2419: tat kim apariṇāmitaṃ prajñāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2420: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. api tu khalu punaḥ kathaṃ bhagavan dānapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2421: kathaṃ bhagavan śīlapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2422: kathaṃ bhagavan kṣāntipāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2423: kathaṃ bhagavan vīryapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2424: kathaṃ bhagavan dhyānapāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2425: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2427: advayayogenānanda pariṇāmitaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:2428: advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:2429: advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ kṣāntiḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitā kṣāntiḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavati,
K02sspp2_4u:2430: advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ vīryaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati,
K02sspp2_4u:2431: anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ vīryaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati,
K02sspp2_4u:2432: advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavati,
K02sspp2_4u:2433: advayayogena pariṇāmitā prajñā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā bhavaty anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitā prajñā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:2434: āha: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2436: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2438: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ kṣāntiḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2440: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ vīryaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2442: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā bhavati?
K02sspp2_4u:2444: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena pariṇāmitā prajñā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ (ŚsP_II-4_68)
K02sspp2_4u:2664: tathā hi rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2665: tathā hi rūpaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2666: vedanā vedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2667: tathā hi vedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2668: saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2669: tathā hi saṃjñā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhlkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2670: saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2671: tathā hi saṃskārā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2672: vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2673: tathā hi vijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:2674: cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2675: tathā hi cakṣuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2676: śrotraṃ śrotreṇa śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2677: tathā hi śrotraṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2678: ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2679: tathā hi ghrāṇaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2680: jihvā jihvayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2681: tathā hi jihvā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2682: kāyaḥ kāyeṇa śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2683: tathā hi kāyaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2684: mano manasā śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2685: tathā hi śūnyaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:2686: rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2687: tathā hi rūpaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2688: śabdaḥ śabdena śūnyaḥ tat kasya hetoh?
K02sspp2_4u:2689: tathā hi śabdaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2690: gandhaḥ gandhena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2691: tathā hi gandhaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2692: raso rasena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2693: tathā hi rasaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2694: sparśaḥ sparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2695: tathā hi sparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2696: dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2697: tathā hi dharmāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:2698: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2699: tathā hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2700: śrotravijñānaṃ śrotravijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2701: tathā hi śrotravijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2702: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2703: tathā hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2704: jihvāvijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2705: tathā hi jihvāvijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2706: kāyavijñānaṃ kāyavijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2707: tathā hi kāyavijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2708: manovijñānaṃ manovijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2709: tathā hi manovijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:2710: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2711: tathā hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2712: śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2713: tathā hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2714: ghrāṇasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2715: tathā hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2718: tathā hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2719: kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2720: tathā hi kāyasaṃsparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2721: manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2722: tathā hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:2723: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2724: tathā hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2727: tathā hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2728: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2729: tathā hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2730: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2731: tathā hi jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2732: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2733: tathā hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2734: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2735: tathā hi manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:2736: pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2737: tathā hi pṛthivīdhātuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2738: abdhātur abdhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2739: tathā hy abdhātuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2740: tejodhātuḥ tejodhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2741: tathā hi tejodhātuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2742: vāyudhātur vāyudhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2743: tathā hi vāyudhātuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2744: ākāśadhātur ākāśadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2745: tathā hy ākāśadhātuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2746: vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2747: tathā hi vijñānadhātuś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:2748: avidyā avidyayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2749: tathā hy avidyā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2750: saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2751: tathā hi saṃskārāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2752: vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2753: tathā hi vijñānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2754: nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpeṇa śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2755: tathā hi nāmarūpaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2756: ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2757: tathā hi ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2758: sparśaḥ sparśena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2759: tathā hi sparśaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2760: vedanā vedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2761: tathā hi vedanā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2762: tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2763: tathā hi tṛṣṇā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, upādānam (ŚsP_II-4_74)
K02sspp2_4u:2765: tathā hy upādānaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2766: bhavo bhavena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoh?
K02sspp2_4u:2767: tathā hi bhavaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ. jātir jatyā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2768: tathā hi jātiś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2769: jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2770: tathā hi nāmarūpaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:2771: adhyātmaśūnyatā adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2772: tathā hy adhyātmaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2773: bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2774: tathā hi bahirdhāśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2775: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2776: tathā hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2777: śūnyatāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2778: tathā hi śūnyatāśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2779: mahāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2780: tathā hi mahāśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2781: paramārthaśūnyatā paramārtaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2782: tathā hi paramārthaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2783: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2784: tathā hy saṃskṛtaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2785: asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā asaṃskṛaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2786: tathā hy asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2787: atyantaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2788: tathā hy atyantaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2789: anavarāgraśūnyatā anavarāgraśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2790: tathā hy anavarāgraśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2791: anavakāraśūnyatā anavakāraśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2792: tathā hy anavakāraśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2793: prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2794: tathā hi prakṛtiśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2795: sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2796: tathā hi sarvadharmaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2797: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2798: tathā hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2799: anupalambhaśūnyatā anupalambhaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoh?
K02sspp2_4u:2800: tathā hy anupalambhaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad. advaidhīkāram,
K02sspp2_4u:2803: tathā hy abhāvaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2804: svabhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2805: tathā hi svabhāvaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2806: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2807: tathā hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:2808: smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2809: tathā hi smṛtyupasthānāni ca pāramitā cādyayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2810: samyakprahāṇāni samyakprahāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2811: tathā hi samyakprahāṇāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2812: ṛddhipādā ṛddhipādaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2813: tathā hy ṛddhipādāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2815: tathā hīndriyāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2816: balāni balaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2817: tathā hi balāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2818: bodhyaṅgāni bodhyaṅgaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2819: tathā hi bodhyaṅgāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2820: mārgo mārgena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2821: tathā hi mārgaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2822: āryasatyāny āryasatyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2823: tathā hy āryasatyāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2824: dhyānāni dhyānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2825: tathā hi dhyānāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2826: apramāṇāny apramāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2827: tathā hy apramāṇāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2828: ārūpyasamāpattaya ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2829: tathā hy ārūpyasamāpattayaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2830: vimokṣā vimokṣaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2831: tathā hi vimokṣāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2833: tathā hy anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2834: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣasamukhaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2835: tathā hi śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2836: abhijñā abhijñābhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2837: tathā hy abhijñāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2838: samādhayaḥ samādhibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2839: tathā hi samādhayaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2840: dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi (ŚsP_II-4_76)
K02sspp2_4u:2841: dhāraṇīmukhāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2842: daśatathāgatabalāni daśatathāgatabalaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2843: tathā hi daśatathāgatabalāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2844: vaiśāradyāni vaiśāradyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2845: tathā hi vaiśāradyāni ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2846: pratisaṃvidaḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoh?
K02sspp2_4u:2847: tathā hi pratisaṃvidaś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ mahākaruṇā mahākaruṇayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2848: tathā hi mahākaruṇā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2849: āveṇikabuddhadharmā āveṇikabuddhadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2850: tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2851: srotaāpattiphalaṃ srotaāpattiphalena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2852: tathā hi srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2853: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphaIena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2854: tathā hi sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2855: anāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2856: tathā hy anāgāmiphalaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2857: arhattvam arhattvena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2858: tathā hy arhattvaṃ ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2859: pratyekabodhiḥ pratyekabodhyā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2860: tathā hy pratyekabodhiś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:2861: mārgākārajñatā mārgākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:2862: tathā hi mārgākārajñatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samyaksaṃbodhyā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoh?
K02sspp2_4u:2863: tathā hi bodhisattvāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:2865: tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva
K02sspp2_4u:2866: pūrvaṅgamā sarvaśūnyatānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:2867: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā caturṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:2868: dhyānānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā
K02sspp2_4u:2869: catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgama aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva
K02sspp2_4u:2870: pūrvaṅgamā navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:2871: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā abhijñānāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā samādhīnāṃ prajñāpāramitaiva
K02sspp2_4u:2883: tad yathāpi nāmānanda mahāpṛthivyāṃ bījāni prakīrṇāni sāmāgrī labhamānāni virohanti
K02sspp2_4u:2884: mahāpṛthivyāṃ ca teṣāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ mahāpṛthivī pratiṣṭhitāni tāni bījāni prarohanti.
K02sspp2_4u:2885: evam eva prajñāpāramitā pratiṣṭhā imā pañcapāramitā virohanti.
K02sspp2_4u:2955: tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitaivāsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ pariṇāyikā,
K02sspp2_4u:2984: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:2985: na me bhagavan tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarve (ŚsP_II-4_79)
K02sspp2_4u:2986: guṇāḥ parikīrtitā ye mayā bhagavato 'ntikād udgṛhītā dhāritā vācitāyān guṇān sa kulaputro
K02sspp2_4u:2987: vā kuladuhitā vā parigṛhīṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan
K02sspp2_4u:2988: yoniśaś ca manasikurvan ye mayā bhagavato 'ntikād asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā guṇā udgṛhītāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:2989: paryavāptā dhāritā vācitāḥ pravartitāḥ prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgṛhītayā dhāritayā
K02sspp2_4u:2990: vācitayā paryavāptayā pravartitayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3042: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati.
K02sspp2_4u:3043: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā pravartitayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā kṣatriyamahāśālakulānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
K02sspp2_4u:3056: ābhāsvarā devā loke prajñāyante. parīttābhā devā loke prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:3072: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā pravartitayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā srotaāpannā loke prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:3078: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā pravartitayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
K02sspp2_4u:3081: na punaḥ kauśika yena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā udgrahītā
K02sspp2_4u:3082: bhaviṣyati dhāritā bhaviṣyati vācitā bhaviṣyati paryavāptā bhaviṣyati yoniśaś ca
K02sspp2_4u:3083: manasikṛtā bhaviṣyati tasyemām eva guṇān vadāmi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3086: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhītā bhaviṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3088: apramāṇena samādhiskandhena samanvāgatās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3089: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3091: apramāṇena prajñāskandhena samanvāgatās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3092: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3094: apramāṇena vimuktiskandhena samanvāgatās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3095: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3097: apramāṇena vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhena samanvāgatās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3098: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3100: tathāgatapratipannās te kauśika kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca veditavyā ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3102: yaś ca kauśika sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktaskandho
K02sspp2_4u:3103: vimuktijñānadarśanaskandho yaś ca teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā śīlaskandhaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:3104: samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ. asya kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:3106: purataḥ sa sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ śatatamīm api kālāṃ nopaiti,
K02sspp2_4u:3116: upaniśām api na kṣamate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3117: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmeś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3118: na ca kaścid dharma ājñātaḥ ye punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3120: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tāṃ ca satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:3121: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
K02sspp2_4u:3122: vividhaiś ca vādyas teṣām apy ahaṃ kulaputraṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ tataś cetad evemāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3123: dṛṣṭadhārmikān sā parāyikāṃś ca guṇāṃ vadāmi.
K02sspp2_4u:3124: śakra āha: aham api bhagavan tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi,
K02sspp2_4u:3125: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3126: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyanti sarvākārajñatācittena imāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā satkariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3127: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:3129: tasya punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svadhyāyamānasya,
K02sspp2_4u:3130: bahūni devaputrasahasrāṇi manasidharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkramiṣyanti. tasya khalu punaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:3131: kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayatas te
K02sspp2_4u:3133: yad api te dharmabhānakānam atrāpi tu kāmā bhavanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3134: tat tenaiva dharmagauravena devaputrāḥ pratibhānam upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K02sspp2_4u:3135: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaguṇaṃ parigrahīṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3136: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyaty enāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3137: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair (ŚsP_II-4_83)
K02sspp2_4u:3139: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamānasya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ purato 'nācalayatā bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3140: kaścit mām anuyokṣyati copalapsyate ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3141: tathā hi tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3142: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā abhinnā laukikā lokottaraś ca sāsravāś
K02sspp2_4u:3143: cānāsravāś ca sādhāraṇāś ca kuśalāś cākusalāś ca saṃskṛtāś cāsaṃskṛtāś ca śrāvakadharmāś
K02sspp2_4u:3144: ca pratyekabuddhadharmāś ca bodhisattvadharmāś ca buddhadharmāś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3145: tathā hy eṣā sarvaṃ kuśaladharmāṇāṃ nidhiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3146: sa ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
K02sspp2_4u:3150: saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito 'tyantaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito 'navarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ sthito 'navakāraśūnyatāyāṃ sthitaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3154: svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitaḥ. sa aupalabhike sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3157: yo 'py upālabhate tam api prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na samanupaśyati. evaṃ khalu taṃ kulaputraṃ vā kuladuhitaraṃ vā prajñāpāramitayodgṛhītayā na kaścid
K02sspp2_4u:3158: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇato
K02sspp2_4u:3159: dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvato yoniśaś ca manasikurvataś cittaṃ nācaleṣyate notrasiṣyati
K02sspp2_4u:3160: na saṃtrasiṣyati na saṃtrāsam āpatsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3161: tathā hi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vastu na samanupaśyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3162: yo 'valīyeta vā saṃlīyeta vā uttrasyed vā saṃtrasyed vā saṃtrāsam āpadyed vā,
K02sspp2_4u:3163: imāṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhīṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3164: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3165: tāñ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3166: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:3168: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3169: tāñ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3171: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
K02sspp2_4u:3172: vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. sa priyo bhaviṣyati mātāpitṝṇāṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3173: rājñāṃ rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ śravaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
K02sspp2_4u:3174: bhagavanto bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāḥ pratyekabuddhāś cārhantaś cānāgāminaś ca sakṛdāgāminaś
K02sspp2_4u:3175: ca srotaāpannāś ca teṣām api sa priyo bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3176: manāpaś ca sadevasya lokasya sabrahmakasya saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ priyo bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3177: manāpaś ca anācchedya pratibhānaś ca bhaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:3226: anācchedyā cāsya sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyaty anācchedyā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhir bhaviṣyaty
K02sspp2_4u:3227: anācchedyā cāsya sarvākārajñatā bhaviṣyati pratibalaś ca bhaviṣyati purataḥ utpannotpannānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3228: pratyanuyogānāṃ sahadharmeṇa niḥśaraṇe imān api sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān
K02sspp2_4u:3229: guṇān parigṛhiṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
K02sspp2_4u:3230: paryavāpsyati yoniśaś manasikariṣyaty avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvākārajñatācittena
K02sspp2_4u:3231: tāṃś ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair
K02sspp2_4u:3232: gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:3233: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3234: tatra kauśika ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyai
K02sspp2_4u:3235: samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
K02sspp2_4u:3236: brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇa ābhāḥ parīttābhā
K02sspp2_4u:3237: apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubbāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3238: bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā bṛhatphalā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3239: te tatrāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācitvodgṛhya paryavāpya vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K02sspp2_4u:3240: ye 'pi te śuddhāvāsakāyikā devā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3241: te 'pi tatrāgamyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācitvodgṛhya paryavāpya vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
K02sspp2_4u:3242: tatra kauśika ye daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyai
K02sspp2_4u:3243: samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
K02sspp2_4u:3244: brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇa abhāḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā
K02sspp2_4u:3245: ābhāsvarāḥ śubhāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā bṛhāḥ parīttabṛhā apramāṇabṛhā
K02sspp2_4u:3247: ye 'pi śuddhāvāsakāyikā devā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā,
K02sspp2_4u:3249: te tatrāgamyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitvodgṛhya paryavāpya vanditvā namaskṛtya punar
K02sspp2_4u:3251: tatra kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3252: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu lokadhatuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā yāmās
K02sspp2_4u:3253: tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā
K02sspp2_4u:3254: devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇa devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā
K02sspp2_4u:3255: devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3256: bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā,
K02sspp2_4u:3258: ye'pi te suddhāvāsakāyikā devā abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devā,
K02sspp2_4u:3260: ihāgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitum udgṛhītuṃ paryavāptuṃ vandituṃ pūjayituṃ tebhya
K02sspp2_4u:3261: idaṃ dharmadānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu ta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācitvodgṛhya paryavāpya
K02sspp2_4u:3262: pūjayitvā vanditvā namaskṛtya punar api prakramanti tasya punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya
K02sspp2_4u:3263: vā kuladuhitur vā ya iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devās
K02sspp2_4u:3264: trāyastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
K02sspp2_4u:3265: devā brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā
K02sspp2_4u:3266: ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ subhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā
K02sspp2_4u:3267: devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā
K02sspp2_4u:3268: devā bṛhatphalā devā abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devā,
K02sspp2_4u:3269: ye 'pi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā devā (ŚsP_II-4_87)
K02sspp2_4u:3270: yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devā paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmakāyikā
K02sspp2_4u:3271: devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā
K02sspp2_4u:3272: devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā
K02sspp2_4u:3274: bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā,
K02sspp2_4u:3275: abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā ḍevā akaniṣṭhā devās te dharmavareṇa
K02sspp2_4u:3276: guptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti. nāsya kauśikāvatāraprekṣy avatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate
K02sspp2_4u:3278: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigrahīṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3279: ye 'pi devaputrā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās te tatrāgantavyā maṃsyante,
K02sspp2_4u:3280: asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe tasya ca kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3281: tathā hi kauśika te kulaputrā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇārthāya sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhārthāya pratyupasthitāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:3282: śakra āha: katham bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñāsyate,
K02sspp2_4u:3309: iha akaniṣṭhā devā āgacchanti. samantād daśa dig lokadhātubhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitum udgrahītuṃ paryavāptuṃ vandituṃ namaskartuṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum.
K02sspp2_4u:3311: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udāram avabhāsaṃ saṃjñāsyate yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sthāpitā bhaviṣyati niṣṭhā (ŚsP_II-4_88)
K02sspp2_4u:3312: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā gantavyā maheśākhyamāheśākhyā maharddhikā mahānubhāvā
K02sspp2_4u:3313: mahaujaskā iha devatā āgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitum udgrahītuṃ paryavāptuṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3314: vandituṃ namaskartuṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum.
K02sspp2_4u:3316: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caukṣasamācāro bhavati tasya
K02sspp2_4u:3317: tayā caukṣasamācāratayā devatā āgamyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitvodgṛhya paryavāpya
K02sspp2_4u:3318: satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3319: yāś ca tatra pradeśo alpaśākhyadevatā adhyuṣitā bhaviṣyanti tās tatropasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate. tāsāṃ maheśākhyānāṃ devātānāṃ tejaś ca śriyaṃ ca gauravaṃ cāsahamānā,
K02sspp2_4u:3320: yathā yathā maheśākhyamaheśākhyā maharddhikā mahānubhāvā devatā upasaṃkramitavyā maṃsyate,
K02sspp2_4u:3321: tathā tathā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udārādhimuktiko bhaviṣyati. tasya ca sthānasya samantād acaukṣasamudācāratā na pracārayitavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:3322: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe gandhodakāvasiktaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ kartavyaḥ puṣpagandhāvakīrṇagandhaghaṭikānidhūpitaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3323: avasaktapaṭṭadāmācailavitānavitato netrapracāraṃ ca tat sa pṛthivīpradeśo 'laṃkartavyaḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:3324: na punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā kāyaklamatho bhaviṣyati kāyasukhatāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3325: ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñāsyate. kāyalaghutāṃ ca kāyakathanīyataṃ ca cittasukhatāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3326: ca sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñāsyate cittalaghutāṃ ca cittakam athanīyatāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3327: ca tataḥ sa rātrau śayyāṃ kalpayantīmām eva prajñāpāramitām aśayeṇādhimuñcan na pāpakān
K02sspp2_4u:3328: svapnān drakṣati sa paśyaṃs tathāgatam evārhantan samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ drakṣyati dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:3330: bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayataṃ tasya ca tathāgatasyāntikād dharmaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3331: yad uta dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitām.
K02sspp2_4u:3336: smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo
K02sspp2_4u:3337: mārga āryasatyāni dhyānāni apramāṇāni ārūpyasamāpattayo aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ
K02sspp2_4u:3339: abhijñā samādhīn dhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇām aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāś ca.
K02sspp2_4u:3340: tasyāś ca dānapāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3341: tasyāś ca śīlapāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śrosyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3342: tasyāś ca vīryapāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3343: tasyāś ca kṣāntipāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3344: tasyāś ca dhyānapāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3345: tasyāś ca prajñāpāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:3347: tasyāś ca bahirdhāśūnyatāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3349: evaṃ hi śūnyatāśūnyatāyā mahāśūnyatāyāḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyāḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā
K02sspp2_4u:3353: teṣāṃ ca caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3354: teṣāṃ ca caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3355: teṣāṃ ca caturṇām ṛddhipādānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3356: teṣāñ ca pañcānām indriyānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3357: teṣāñ ca pañcānāṃ balānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3358: teṣāñ ca saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3361: teṣāñ ca caturṇāṃ dhyānānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroḥyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3362: teṣāñ ca caturṇām apramāṇānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3363: teṣāñ ca catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3364: teṣāñ cāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3365: teṣāñ ca navām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śrohyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3369: teṣāñ ca samādhīnām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3370: teṣāñ ca dhāraṇīmukhānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3371: teṣāñ ca tathāgatabalānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3372: teṣāñ ca caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3373: teṣāñ ca catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidānām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3374: tasyāś ca mahākaruṇāyām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3375: tasyāñ cāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3376: bodhivṛkṣaṃ drakṣati bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlam upasaṃkrāmaṃ taṃ drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3377: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyamānaṃ drakṣyati tathābhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayaṃ taṃ drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3378: bahūni ca bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati dharmasaṅgāyanti. evaṃ sarvākārajñatā parigṛhītavyā. evañ ca sattvāḥ paripācayitavyā evaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3379: evaṃ māras sa pariṣadkāṃ nirjatavyā bahunāñ ca buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṇāṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3380: pūrvasyāṃ diśi śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha
K02sspp2_4u:3383: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv
K02sspp2_4u:3384: amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhiḥ bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
K02sspp2_4u:3385: iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
K02sspp2_4u:3386: paścimāyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv
K02sspp2_4u:3387: amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
K02sspp2_4u:3388: iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati.
K02sspp2_4u:3389: uttarasyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv
K02sspp2_4u:3390: amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
K02sspp2_4u:3391: iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
K02sspp2_4u:3392: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin
K02sspp2_4u:3393: lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
K02sspp2_4u:3396: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin
K02sspp2_4u:3397: lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
K02sspp2_4u:3398: iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
K02sspp2_4u:3399: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin
K02sspp2_4u:3400: lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
K02sspp2_4u:3401: iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
K02sspp2_4u:3402: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin
K02sspp2_4u:3403: lokadhātāv amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
K02sspp2_4u:3404: iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
K02sspp2_4u:3405: adhastād diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv
K02sspp2_4u:3406: amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
K02sspp2_4u:3407: iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati,
K02sspp2_4u:3408: upariṣṭād diśi bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty amuṣmin lokadhātāv
K02sspp2_4u:3409: amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
K02sspp2_4u:3410: iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati.
K02sspp2_4u:3411: pūrvasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3412: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti
K02sspp2_4u:3414: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3415: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3416: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti
K02sspp2_4u:3418: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3421: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṇi drakṣanti
K02sspp2_4u:3423: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3424: uttarasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3425: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti
K02sspp2_4u:3427: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3428: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3429: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti
K02sspp2_4u:3431: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3432: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3433: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti
K02sspp2_4u:3435: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3436: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3437: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṇi drakṣanti
K02sspp2_4u:3439: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3440: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3441: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti
K02sspp2_4u:3443: bahuvidhābhiś ca pujābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān (ŚsP_II-4_93) drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3444: adhastād diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3445: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti
K02sspp2_4u:3447: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3448: upariṣṭād diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3449: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti
K02sspp2_4u:3451: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3453: sa khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imān eva rūpān bhadrakā svapnān drakṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3454: sa sukham eva śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati sukhaṃ ca prativibhotsyate srotaprakṣiptaś cāsya kāyo bhhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3455: laghusaṃjñā ca kāye saṃjñāsyate na gurusaṃjñā na cāsya balavatyāhāragṛddhir bhaviṣyati na cīvaragṛddhir bhaviṣyati na glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāragṛdhir
K02sspp2_4u:3456: mṛddhī cāsyāhārasaṃjñā bhaviṣyati mṛddhīcīvarasaṃjñā bhaviṣyati mṛddhīglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ saṃjñā bhaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:3457: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika yogācārasya bhikṣoḥ samādhavyutthitasya manasikārapariṣyandi tena cittena balavatyāhāragṛddhir bhaviṣyati mṛdukā cāsyāhārasaṃjñā
K02sspp2_4u:3458: evam eva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na bakavatyāhāragṛddhir bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3459: tathā hi tasyā mānuṣyāḥ kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:3460: ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandhharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3461: ye ca dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3462: ye paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3463: ye ca uttarasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3464: ye uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3465: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3466: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3467: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3468: adhastād diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3469: upariṣṭād diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:3470: imām api kauśika dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhītukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā
K02sspp2_4u:3471: vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitāprayatvataḥ srotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā
K02sspp2_4u:3472: paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyāḥ. sarvākārajñatācittena cāvirahitena bhavitavyāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:3473: atha cet sa kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgṛhīyān
K02sspp2_4u:3474: na dhārayen na vācayen na paryavāpnuyān na yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt tena kulaputreṇa
K02sspp2_4u:3475: vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā satkartavyā gurukartavyā
K02sspp2_4u:3476: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś cchattrair
K02sspp2_4u:3478: evaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahujanahitāya pratipanno bhaviṣyati bahujanasukhāya pratipanno bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3479: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati na tve vayaḥ samatād (ŚsP_II-4_95)
K02sspp2_4u:3480: daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyakṣaṃbuddhān saśrāvakasaṃghān yāvaj
K02sspp2_4u:3482: parinirvṛtān tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ saptaratnamayān stūpākāryat,
K02sspp2_4u:3483: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiś patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:3486: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayata:
K02sspp2_4u:3487: sacet tvaṃ kauśikemaṃ jāmbūdvīpaṃ pūrṇaṃ cūḍikāvabaddhaṃ tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ labhethā yac ceyaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakaṃ likhitvopanāmyeta,
K02sspp2_4u:3489: śakra āha: sacen me bhagavann ayaṃ jāmbūdvīpaḥ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3490: dīpeta yac ceyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pustakaṃ likhitvopanāmyeta imām evāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3492: na me bhagavan tatra tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ nāpratyayaṃ nābahumānatā nāpy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgataśarīrāṇi,
K02sspp2_4u:3493: na satkartukāmo na gurukartukāmo na mānayitukāmo na pūjayitukāmaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3494: api tu khalu punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā niryātāni tāni śarīrāṇi tena tena tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3495: satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjayante prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni śarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3497: yadāhaṃ bhagavan tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ pūjayeyaṃ divyaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:3498: puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś
K02sspp2_4u:3499: cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyais
K02sspp2_4u:3500: tat prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitānīti kṛtvā yac ca tathāgataśarīrāṇi sadevamānuṣāsurena
K02sspp2_4u:3501: lokena satkrīyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante tat prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitānīti kṛtvā.
K02sspp2_4u:3502: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ chāradvatīputraḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:3503: iyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitā agrāhyā arūpiṇī anidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā.
K02sspp2_4u:3504: tat kathaṃ tvam agrāhyā prajñāpāramitām arūpiṇīm anidarśanām apratighā ekalakṣaṇā
K02sspp2_4u:3505: yad utālakṣaṇā grahītavyāṃ maṃyase. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3506: na hi prajñāpāramitā grahāya notsargāya pratyupasthitā na hānaye na vṛddhaye nācayāya
K02sspp2_4u:3507: notkṣepāya na saṃkleśāya na vyavadānāya na buddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3508: chorayitrī na bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ dātri na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na śrāvakadharmaṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3509: dātrī na śaikṣāśaikṣādharmāṇāṃ dātrī na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ chorayitrī nāsaṃskṛtadhātor
K02sspp2_4u:3510: dātrī na saṃskṛtadhātoś chorayitrī na dānapāramitāyā dātrī na śīlapāramitāyā dātrī
K02sspp2_4u:3511: na kṣāntipāramitāyā dātrī na vīryapāramitāyā dātrī na dhyānapāramitāyā dātri na prajñāpāramitāyā dātrī.
K02sspp2_4u:3559: śakra āha: evam etad bhadanta śāradvatīputraivam etad yo bhadanta śāradvatīputraivaṃ jānāti,
K02sspp2_4u:3560: na prajñāpāramitā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dātri na pṛthagjanadharmaṇāṃ chorayitrī na bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3561: dātrī na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na śaikṣāśaikṣadharmāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3562: dātrī na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃś chorayitrī nāsaṃskṛtadhātor dātri na saṃskṛtadhātor chorayitrī.
K02sspp2_4u:3563: na dānapāramitāyā dātrī na śīlapāramitāyā dātrī na kṣāntipāramitāyā dātrī na vīryapāramitāyā dātrī na dhyānapāramitāyā dātrī na prajñāpāramitāyā
K02sspp2_4u:3568: na mahāśūnyatāyā dātrī. na paramārthaśūnyatāyā dātri,
K02sspp2_4u:3610: na sarvākārajñatāyā dātrī. sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīḥ sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati.
K02sspp2_4u:3623: atha bhagavāñ chakro devānām indrāya sādhukāram adāt:
K02sspp2_4u:3624: sādhu sādhu kauśikaivam etad yathā nirdiśasi,
K02sspp2_4u:3625: na hi prajñāpāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3630: na hi prajñāpāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3635: na hi vīryapāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3640: na hi śīlapāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3645: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3646: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3648: yo dhyānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3649: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca dhyānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3650: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo vīryapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3651: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca vīryapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3652: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3653: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca kṣāntipāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3654: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3655: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca śīlapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3656: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3657: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:3658: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3659: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3660: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dhyānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3661: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca dhyānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3662: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo vīryapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3663: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca vīryapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3664: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3665: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca kṣāntipāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3666: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3667: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca śīlapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3668: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3669: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:3670: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3671: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3672: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dhyānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3673: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca dhyānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3674: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo vīryapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3675: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca vīryapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3676: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā (ŚsP_II-4_100)
K02sspp2_4u:3678: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca kṣāntipāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3679: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3680: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca śīlapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3681: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3682: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:3683: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3684: tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
K02sspp2_4u:3685: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dhyānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3686: tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca dhyānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3687: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo vīryapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3688: tathā hi kauśikācintyadhhātuś ca vīryapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3689: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3690: tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca kṣāntipāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3691: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3692: tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca śīlapāramita cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3693: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3694: tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:3696: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:3697: namaskaraṇīyeyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokeṇa yatra śikṣitvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā
K02sspp2_4u:3699: yadāhaṃ bhagavan sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ tasminn evendrāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi yan me svakam āsanaṃ tatra devaputrā mamopasthānāyāgacchanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3700: te māṃ pūjayanti yadā tatra na gacchāmi tatrāsanena niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi tadā te devaputrās
K02sspp2_4u:3701: tāṃ sabhām āgatya tad āsanaṃ namaskṛtya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punar eva prakrāmati. iha
K02sspp2_4u:3702: śakro devānām indro niṣadya devebhyas trayastriṃśebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati. evam etad
K02sspp2_4u:3703: bhagavan yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā likhitvā dhārayiṣyate svādhyāyiṣyate,
K02sspp2_4u:3706: te tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vanditvā namaskṛtya prakramiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3707: ito niryātā hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ito niryātāś ca sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā
K02sspp2_4u:3708: ito niryātaṃ ca sattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaṃ yad api tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjā labhante
K02sspp2_4u:3709: tad api prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitatvāt pūjāṃ pratilabhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3710: prajñāpāramitā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ carataḥ sarvajñajñānasyāśrayabhūtā
K02sspp2_4u:3711: pratyayabhūtā kāraṇabhūtā āhārikā tasmāt tarhi bhagavann anayor dvayoḥ pratyaṅgayor
K02sspp2_4u:3712: imām evāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ yadāhaṃ bhagavann imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
K02sspp2_4u:3713: udgṛhīṣyāmy udgṛhya svādhyāyaṃ karomi dharmāntargatena mānasena nimittaṃ apy ahaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3714: bhagavan tasmin samaye na samanupaśyāmi bhayasya vā stambhitatvasya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3715: animittā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:3716: animittā hi bhagavan dhyānapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan dhyānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:3717: animittā hi bhagavan vīryapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan vīryapāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:3718: animittā hi bhagavan kṣāntipāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan kṣāntipāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:3719: animittā hi bhagavan śīlapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan śīlapāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:3720: animittā hi bhagavan dānapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan dānapāramitā.
K02sspp2_4u:3721: animittā hi bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3722: animittā hi bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3723: animittā hi bhagavann adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3724: animittā hi bhagavañ chūnyatāśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavañ chūnyatāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3725: animittā hi bhagavan mahāśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan mahāśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3726: animittā hi bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3727: animittā hi bhagavan saṃskṛtaśūnyatā aliṅga anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan saṃskṛtaśūṅyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3728: animittā hi bhagavann asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhāra hi bhagavann asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3729: animittā hi bhagavann atyantaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann atyantaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3732: animittā hi bhagavann anavakāraśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann anavakāraśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3733: animittā hi bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3734: animittā hi bhagavan sarvadharmaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3735: animittā hi bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3736: animittā hi bhagavann anupalambhaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann anupalambhaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3737: animittā hi bhagavann abhāvaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann abhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3738: animitta hi bhagavan svabhāvasūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan svabhāvaśūnyatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3739: animitta hi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
K02sspp2_4u:3740: animittāni hi bhagavan smṛtyupasthānāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavan smṛtyupasthānāni,
K02sspp2_4u:3741: animittāni hi bhagavan samyakprahāṇāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyahārāṇi hi bhagavan samyakprahāṇāni,
K02sspp2_4u:3742: animittā hi bhagavann ṛddhipadā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann ṛddhipādaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3743: animittāni hi bhagavann indriyāṇy aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhāraṇi hi bhagavann indriyāṇi,
K02sspp2_4u:3744: animittāni hi bhagavan balāny aliṅgāny anabhilapyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavann indriyāṇi,
K02sspp2_4u:3745: animittāni hi bhagavan bodhyaṅgāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhāraṇi hi bhagavan bodhyaṅgāni,
K02sspp2_4u:3746: animittaḥ hi bhagavann āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'liṅgo 'nabhilāpyo 'pravyāhāro hi bhagavann āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3747: animittāni hi bhagavann āryasatyāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavann āryasatyāni,
K02sspp2_4u:3748: animittāni hi bhagavan dhyānāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyahārāṇi hi bhagavann dhyānāni,
K02sspp2_4u:3749: animittāni hi bhagavann apramāṇāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhāṛāṇi hi bhagavann apramāṇāni,
K02sspp2_4u:3750: animittā hi bhagavann ārūpyasamāpattayo 'liṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3751: animittā hi bhagavan vimokṣā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan vimokṣāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3752: animittā hi bhagavann anupūrvaviharasamāpattayo 'liṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann anupūrvaviharasamāpattayaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3753: animittāni hi bhagavañ chūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣasamukhāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavañ chūnyatanimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
K02sspp2_4u:3755: bhagavann abhijñā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann abhijñāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3756: animittā hi bhagavan samādhayo 'liṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan samādhayaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3757: animittāni hi bhagavan dhāraṇīmukhany aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavan dhāraṇīmukhāni,
K02sspp2_4u:3758: animittāni hi bhagavaṃs tathāgatabalāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavaṃs tathāgatabalāni,
K02sspp2_4u:3759: animittāni hi bhagavan vaiśāradyāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavan vaiśāradyāni,
K02sspp2_4u:3760: animittā hi bhagavan pratisaṃvido 'liṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan pratisaṃvidaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3761: animittā hi bhagavan mahākaruṇāliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan mahākaruṇā,
K02sspp2_4u:3762: animittā hi bhagavann āveṇikabuddhadharmā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3763: animittā hi bhagavan sarvajñatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan sarvajñatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3764: animittā hi bhagavan mārgākārajñatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan mārgākārajñatā,
K02sspp2_4u:3765: animittā hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatā.
K02sspp2_4u:3767: saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nimittam abhaviṣyan nānimittaṃ naiva tasya tathāgato
K02sspp2_4u:3768: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmān nimittān aliṅgān abhilāpyān apravyāhārān viditvā
K02sspp2_4u:3769: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sattvānām animittam aliṅgam anabhilāpyam
K02sspp2_4u:3771: yasmāt tarhi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā animittā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā tamāt tathāgataḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3772: sarvadharmān aliṅgān anabhilāpyān apravyāhārān viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
K02sspp2_4u:3773: sattvānām animittam aliṅgam anabhilāpyam apravyāhāraṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. tasmāt
K02sspp2_4u:3774: tarhi bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sadevamanuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyā gurukartavyā
K02sspp2_4u:3775: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
K02sspp2_4u:3776: dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. likhitvā ca satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā
K02sspp2_4u:3777: pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:3779: yo hi kaścid bhagavann imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3780: tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3782: vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:3783: tasya narakagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā na tiryagyonir na yamalokagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:3785: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati tathāgatadarśanena sattvaparipācakena ca buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3786: tāṃś ca tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvan gurukurvan mānayet pūjayet,
K02sspp2_4u:3787: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaih.
K02sspp2_4u:3788: punar bhagavan saced ayaṃ trisāhasro lokadhātuś cūḍikāvabaddhaḥ syāt tathāgataśarīraiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:3789: pūrṇo yac ceyaṃ prajñāpāramitā likhitvopanāmyate. anayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayor bhāgayor
K02sspp2_4u:3790: imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhṇīyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3791: ato niryātā hi bhagavans tathāgatās tāni ca tathāgataśarīrāṇi tena tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3792: satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante yāni kulaputrāś ca kuladuhitaraś ca satkṛtya
K02sspp2_4u:3793: gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā na durgatiṃ vinipātaṃ gacchanti. divyamānuṣīḥ saṃpattīr
K02sspp2_4u:3794: anubhūya yathā praṇidhānaṃ parinirvāti. yadi vā śrāvakayānena yadi vā pratyekabuddhayānena
K02sspp2_4u:3796: api tu khalu punar bhagavan yac ca tathāgatadarśanaṃ yac ca prajñāpāramitāyā darśanaṃ tulyam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3797: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā ca tathāgataś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K02sspp2_4u:3798: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yac ca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas triṣu prātihāryeṣu
K02sspp2_4u:3800: yac ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parasmai deśayet tulyam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
