K02sspp2_4u:3801: ito niryātā hi bhagavan tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti niryātāni trīṇi prātihāryāṇi.
K02sspp2_4u:3803: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yac ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopamāṃ tathāgatān arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:3816: yac ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parasmai
K02sspp2_4u:3817: deśayet tulyam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3818: ito niryātā hi te daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ito niryātā tāni
K02sspp2_4u:3819: triṇi prātihāryāṇi ito niryātaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānaṃ nidānetyuktakajātakavaipulyādbhutadharmāvadānopadeśāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:3820: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yac ca te daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
K02sspp2_4u:3821: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ satkriyeran gurukriyeran mānayeran
K02sspp2_4u:3822: pūjayeran puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:3823: patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. yaś ca prajñāpāramitā pustakaṃ likhitvā satkriyeta
K02sspp2_4u:3824: gurukriyeta mānyeta pūjyeta puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś
K02sspp2_4u:3825: chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyais tulyam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3826: ito niryātā hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:3827: punar aparaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati
K02sspp2_4u:3828: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati parebhyaś ca vistareṇa
K02sspp2_4u:3829: saṃprakāśayiṣyati tasya narakagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā na tiryagyonir na yamalokagatiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:3830: pratikāṅkṣitavyā na śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3831: tathā hi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sthito 'vaivartyabhūmau veditavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3832: tathā hi sa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati paryavāpnoti
K02sspp2_4u:3833: yoniśaś ca manasikaroti tāṃ ca likhitvā satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati puṣpair
K02sspp2_4u:3834: mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś
K02sspp2_4u:3835: ca vādyais tathā hi bhagavan sarvabhayapraśamani sarvaroganirghātanīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā.
K02sspp2_4u:3836: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati
K02sspp2_4u:3837: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati tāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati
K02sspp2_4u:3838: pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:3839: patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyais tasya na kutaścid bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:3841: bhagavan dhanikabhayabhītaḥ puruṣo rājānaṃ seveta rājānam upatiṣṭheta sa rājānaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3842: sevamāno rājānam upatiṣṭhamāno yata evāsya bhayaṃ bhavati ta evaivaṃ sevante na ca
K02sspp2_4u:3843: sa tebhyo bibheti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3844: evam etad bhagavan bhavati yo rājaniḥśrito bhavati balavatiniśrito bhavati.
K02sspp2_4u:3845: evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhate. yad api bhagavan sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ tad api prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3846: tasmād ahaṃ bhagavann anayor dvayoḥ pratyaṅgayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhṇīyāt. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:3847: ito niryātāni hi bhagavan tathāgataśarīrāṇy ato niryātāni dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny
K02sspp2_4u:3848: ato niryātāni tathāgatasya daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K02sspp2_4u:3850: ato niryātā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā ato niryātā bhagavan pañcapāramitā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate,
K02sspp2_4u:3851: yāvad ato niryātā tathāgatasya sarvākārajñatā yatra bhagavan grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu
K02sspp2_4u:3852: yatra ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyate
K02sspp2_4u:3853: vācayiṣyate paryavāpsyate tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyate pūjayiṣyate,
K02sspp2_4u:3854: tena tatra manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vāvatāraprekṣy avatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate. sarve ca te anupūrveṇa parinirvānadharmāṇo bhaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:3855: trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ manyat amānyat anena yānena. evaṃ mahārthikā bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:3856: atra hi nāma bhagavaṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvānāṃ buddhasatyena pratyupasthitā buddhotpādo bhagavaṃs tatra lokadhātau pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:3858: tad yathāpi nāma bhagavann anargho 'yaṃ mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3859: tac ca mahāmaṇiratnam ebhir evaṃrūpair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3862: yatrāmanuṣyagṛhītā stri vā puruṣo vā bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3864: tataḥ so 'manuṣyas tasya mahāmaṇiratnasya tejo sahamānaḥ kṣipram evāprakrāman nāvatiṣṭheta
K02sspp2_4u:3865: pittena vā dahyamānasya tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ śarīre sthāpyeta tad api pittam atigṛhṇīyāt
K02sspp2_4u:3866: pātābhibhūte vā śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyet tad api vā taṃ atigṛhṇīyāt.
K02sspp2_4u:3867: śleṣmaṇāropastabdhe śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tad api śleṣmāṇam upaśāmayet sāṃnipātiko vā vyādhir bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3868: tac ca mahāmaṇiratnaṃ śarīre sthāpyeta tad api sāṃnipātikaṃ vyādhim upaśamen nāsau (ŚsP_II-4_107)
K02sspp2_4u:3869: vivardheta tad rātrau cāvabhāsaṃ kuryād uṣmakāle ca vartamāne yatra pradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3870: sthāpyeta tat taṃ pradeśaṃ śītalaṃ kuryāt śītakāle ca vartamāne yatra pradeśe tan
K02sspp2_4u:3871: mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpya na tat pradeśam uṣmaṃ kuryāt,
K02sspp2_4u:3872: yatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ s sthāpyeta tat pṛthvīpradeśe nātyuṣmaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3873: nātiśītamṛdusaṃpannaṃ kuryāt yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta na
K02sspp2_4u:3875: tad anye 'pi ca vṛścikādayaḥ sarīsṛpāḥ prāṇino na tatropacaret. yā kācid bhagavan strī vā puruṣo vā āśīviṣeṇa daṣṭho bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3876: tasya tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ darśet tasya sahadarśanena tad viṣaṃ vigacchet.
K02sspp2_4u:3877: ebhir bhagavann evaṃrūpair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3878: yāsām api bhagavan strīṇāṃ vā puruṣāṇāṃ vā arbudaṃ vā timiraṃ vā ajakaṃ vā akṣirogo
K02sspp2_4u:3879: vā srotarogo vā ghrāṇarogo vā jihvārogo vā kaṇṭharogo vā kāyarogo vā bhavet teṣāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3881: teṣāṃ tad arbudaṃ vā vā timiraṃ vā ajakaṃ vā akṣirogo vā srotrarogo vā ghrāṇarogo vā jihvārogo vā kaṇṭharogo vā kāyarogo vā upaśāmyet.
K02sspp2_4u:3882: ebhir bhagavann evaṃrūpair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3883: yatrāpi bhagavann udake tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ prakṣipet,
K02sspp2_4u:3884: tad eva tad udakam aṣṭāṅgopetam ekavarṇaṃ bhavet.
K02sspp2_4u:3885: sacet bhagavan nīlakena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
K02sspp2_4u:3886: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3887: sacet pītakena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
K02sspp2_4u:3888: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3889: sacet lohitakena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
K02sspp2_4u:3890: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3891: saced avadānakena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
K02sspp2_4u:3892: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3893: sacet māñjiṣṭhāvarṇena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
K02sspp2_4u:3894: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3895: sacet sphaṭikavarṇena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
K02sspp2_4u:3896: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3897: ebhiś ca nānāprakāraiś cīvarais tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyeta tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
K02sspp2_4u:3898: yad api bhagavaṃs tatrodake kāluṣyante tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ prasādayet,
K02sspp2_4u:3901: anyaiś ca evam eva bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā divyamaṇiratnaprakhyā sarvaguṇākarabhūtā sarvapāpamocanī.
K02sspp2_4u:3903: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:3905: kauśika divyam etan maṇiratnam utāho svij jāṃbudvīpakanāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnam asti.
K02sspp2_4u:3906: śakra āha: divyam etad bhadanta maṇiratnam.
K02sspp2_4u:3907: api tu khalu punar bhadantānanda yāni jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ mānuṣyāṇāṃ mahāmaṇiratnāny asti tāni parīttāni gurūṇi ca,
K02sspp2_4u:3908: yāni divyāni tāni mahānti laghūni ca tair aṅgais tāvat suparipūrṇāni jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3909: manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni yathā divyāni tāni punar jāṃbūdvīpakāni ratnāni teṣāṃ divyānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3910: maṇiratnānāṃ saṃkhyāṃ vā kalāṃ vā gaṇanāṃ vā upamāṃ vā upaniśāṃ vā nopayānti.
K02sspp2_4u:3911: punar api śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:3912: tat khalu punar bhagavan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yasmin karaṇḍake prakṣiptaṃ bhavet yadā kṣiptaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:3913: bhavet yadā kṣipataṃ ca tataḥ karaṇḍakāt spṛhaṇīyam eva tat karaṇḍakaṃ bhavet tair
K02sspp2_4u:3914: maṇiratnaguṇaiḥ paro 'pi tatra karaṇḍake spṛhom utpādayet,
K02sspp2_4u:3915: evam eva bhagavan yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3916: tatra teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā kāyikāś cetasikā vā duḥkhopadravā manuṣyakṛtā vā amanuṣyakṛtā vā na bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:3917: mahāmaṇiratnam iti bhagavan prajñāpāramitām etad adhivacanaṃ sarvākārajñatājñānasyaitad adhivacanam.
K02sspp2_4u:3918: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3919: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dhyānapāramitāyā guṇā dhyānapāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3920: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ vīryapāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi vīryapāramitāyā guṇā vīryapāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3921: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi kṣāntipāramitāyā guṇāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3922: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ śīlapāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi śīlapāramitāyā (ŚsP_II-4_109)
K02sspp2_4u:3923: guṇāḥ śīlapāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhajanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3924: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dānapāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dānapāramitāyā guṇā dānapāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam.
K02sspp2_4u:3925: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam adhyātmaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy adhyātmaśūnyatāyā guṇā adhyātmaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3926: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayituṃ aprameyā hi bahirdhāśūnyatāyā guṇā bahirdhāśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3927: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā guṇā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3928: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi śūnyatāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3929: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ mahāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi mahāśūnyatāyā guṇā mahāśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3930: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi paramārthaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3931: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3932: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā guṇā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3933: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam atyantaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy atyantaśūnyatāyā guṇā atyantaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3934: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam anavarāgraśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy anavarāgraśūnyatāyā guṇā anavarāgraśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3935: kiyanto bhagavañchakyam anavakāraśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy anavakāraśūnyatāyā guṇā anavakāraśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3936: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi prakṛtiśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3937: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3939: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3940: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam anupalambhaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy anupalambhaśūnyatāyā guṇā anupalambhaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3941: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam abhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy abhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇā abhāvaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3942: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi svabhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3943: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam.
K02sspp2_4u:3944: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi smṛtyupasthānānāṃ guṇāḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3945: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi samyakprahāṇānāṃ guṇā samyakprahāṇānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3946: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy ṛddhipādānāṃ guṇā ṛddhipādānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3947: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ pañcānām indriyānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy indriyānāṃ guṇā indriyānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
K02sspp2_4u:3948: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ pañcānaṃ balānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi balānāṃ guṇā balānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3949: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi bodhyaṅgānāṃ guṇā bodhyaṅgānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3950: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasya guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy āryāṣtāṅgasya mārgasya guṇā āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3951: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇam āryasatyānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy āryasatyānāṃ guṇā aryasatyānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīraṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3952: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dhyānānāṃ guṇā dhyānānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3953: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy apramāṇānāṃ guṇā apramāṇānāṃ ca tāni (ŚsP_II-4_111)
K02sspp2_4u:3955: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ guṇā ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3956: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi vimokṣāṇāṃ guṇā vimokṣāṇāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3957: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā
K02sspp2_4u:3958: hy anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ guṇā anupūrvavihārasamāpattināṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3959: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum
K02sspp2_4u:3962: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam abhijñānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyāhy abhijñānāṃ guṇā abhijñānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3963: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ samādhīnāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi samādhīnāṃ guṇāḥ samādhīnāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3964: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ guṇā dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3965: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi tathāgatabalānāṃ guṇāḥ tathāgatabalānāṃ ca i tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3966: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi vaiśāradyānāṃ guṇā vaiśāradyānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3967: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi pratisaṃvidāṃ guṇāḥ pratisaṃvidaṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3968: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ mahāmaitryā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi mahāmaitryā guṇāḥ mahāmaitryāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3969: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ mahākaruṇāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi mahākaruṇāyā guṇā mahākaruṇāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bbājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3970: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ guṇā āveṇikabuddhadharmāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3971: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sarvajñatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi sarvajñatāyā guṇā sarvajñatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3972: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ mārgākārajñatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi mārgākārajñatāyā (ŚsP_II-4_112)
K02sspp2_4u:3973: guṇā mārgākārajñatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3974: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sarvākārajñatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi sarvākārajñatāyā guṇāḥ sarvākārajñatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3975: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ tathatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi tathatāyā guṇās tathatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3976: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam avitathatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy avitathatāyā guṇā avitathatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:3977: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam ananyatathatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy ananyatathatāyā guṇā ananyatathatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
K02sspp2_4u:3978: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dharmatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dharmatāyā guṇā dharmatāyaś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
K02sspp2_4u:3979: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dharmadhātor guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dharmadhātor guṇā dharmadhātoś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
K02sspp2_4u:3980: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dharmasthititāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dharmasthititāyā guṇā dharmasthititāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3981: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dharmaniyāmatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dharmaniyāmatāyā guṇāḥ dharmaniyāmatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3982: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ bhūtakoṭer guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi bhūtakoṭer guṇā bhūtakoṭeś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
K02sspp2_4u:3983: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam acintyadhātor guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy acintyadhātor guṇā acintyadhātoś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
K02sspp2_4u:3984: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇasya guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum
K02sspp2_4u:3987: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sadopekṣāvihāritāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi sadopekṣāvihāritāyā guṇāḥ sadopekṣāvihāritayāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:3988: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam asaṃpramosadharmatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy asaṃpramoṣadharmatāyā guṇā asaṃpramoṣadharmatāyaś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
K02sspp2_4u:4004: tayā ca dharmatāpāramitayā paribhāvitāni tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi tena parinirvṛtasyāpi tasya tathāgatasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
K02sspp2_4u:4006: punar aparaṃ bhagavan tiṣṭhantu trisāhasramahāsāḥsro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:4007: sacet bhagavan daśasu dikṣuḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhā bhaveyur yac ca prajñāpāramitāpustakaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4008: anayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayoḥ pratyaṅgayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhīyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4009: ato niryātāni hi bhagavan tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjyaṃte prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitani bhagavaṃs tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
K02sspp2_4u:4010: yaḥ punar bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād
K02sspp2_4u:4011: mānayet pūjayet sa tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya devamanuṣyasaṃpattīr anubhūya
K02sspp2_4u:4013: deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu yāmeṣu deveṣu tuṣiteṣu deveṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu deveṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu
K02sspp2_4u:4014: deveṣu sukham anubhūya tenaiva kuśalamūlena duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:4015: etāvat tathāgataśarīrapūjāyāḥ phalam imāṃ punaḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan yoniśaś ca manasikurvan samādhipāramitāṃ ca paripūrayiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:4060: śrāvakabhūmiṃ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:4065: yadi vā cakravartāśrayaṃ yadi vā kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu yadi vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu
K02sspp2_4u:4066: yadi vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu yadi vā śakrarūpeṇa yadi vā brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yadi vā
K02sspp2_4u:4067: vaiśramaṇarūpeṇa sa tair ātmabhāvaiḥ sattvān paripācayiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:4068: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan na mama tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ nāpy apratyayā nāpy apūjayitukāmatā nāpy agrahītukāmatā.
K02sspp2_4u:4069: api tu khalu punar bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvatā
K02sspp2_4u:4070: gurukurvatā mānayatā pūjayata sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ hetur upacito bhavati sarvasaṃpattayaś
K02sspp2_4u:4072: tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkṛtā bhavanti gurukṛtāni bhavanti yāni tāni bhavanti pūjitāni bhavanti.
K02sspp2_4u:4073: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā (ŚsP_II-4_115)
K02sspp2_4u:4074: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyate yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti tān
K02sspp2_4u:4075: dhharmakāyena ca jñānakāyena ca draṣṭukāmena pūjayitukāmena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahītavyā
K02sspp2_4u:4076: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pūjayitavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā
K02sspp2_4u:4078: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsakhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tāṃ tathāgatān
K02sspp2_4u:4079: arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāṃ drakṣyati. evaṃ khalu tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā
K02sspp2_4u:4080: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca tāṃ buddhān anusmṛtibhāvayitavyā dharmatayā.
K02sspp2_4u:4081: punar aparaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān saṃdraṣṭukāmena,
K02sspp2_4u:4082: kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā
K02sspp2_4u:4083: paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā pūjayitavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā
K02sspp2_4u:4086: katame dve saṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā asaṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā asaṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā?
K02sspp2_4u:4088: yad adhyātmaśūnyatāyaṃ jñānaṃ yad bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4089: jñānaṃ yad śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad mahāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4090: jñānaṃ yad saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad atyantaśūnyatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4091: jñānaṃ yad anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4092: jñānaṃ yad sarvadharmaśūnyatayāṃ jñānaṃ yad svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad anupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4093: jñānaṃ yad abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānam.
K02sspp2_4u:4125: yasyā notpādo na nirodho na sthānaṃ na sthito nānyathātvaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na hānir na vṛddhir yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvatā,
K02sspp2_4u:4131: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:4132: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
K02sspp2_4u:4133: ye 'pi te etarhi daśadig lokadhātuṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K02sspp2_4u:4134: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāyām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante,
K02sspp2_4u:4135: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atītānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:4136: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgatānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:4137: ye 'py etarhi pratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:4138: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpsyanti prāpnuvanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4144: ye 'pi te etarhi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu pratyekabuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
K02sspp2_4u:4145: yāpayanti tair apīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya pratyekabodhiḥ prāptāḥ prāpsyate
K02sspp2_4u:4147: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyā sarvāṇi trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni,
K02sspp2_4u:4149: tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa na paramārthena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4150: na hi prajñāpāramitā āramitā na pāramitā na hi prajñāpāramitā apāro na pāraḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:4151: na sthalaṃ na nimnaṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na laukikī na lokottarā na saṃskṛtā nāsaṃskṛtā na kuśalā nākuśalā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
K02sspp2_4u:4152: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā buddhadharmānāṃ dātrī,
K02sspp2_4u:4153: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā srotaāpattidharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
K02sspp2_4u:4154: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sakṛdāgāmidharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
K02sspp2_4u:4155: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā anāgāmidharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
K02sspp2_4u:4156: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā arhaddharmāṇāṃ dātrī na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
K02sspp2_4u:4157: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ dātrī.
K02sspp2_4u:4159: śakra āha: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:4160: atra bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāni
K02sspp2_4u:4161: prajānanti na sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptim upalabhate nātmanam upalabhate
K02sspp2_4u:4162: na sattvam upalabhate na jīvam upalabhate na jantum upalabhate na poṣam upalabhate
K02sspp2_4u:4163: na puruṣam upalabhate na pudgalam upalabhate na manujam upalabhate na mānavam upalabhate
K02sspp2_4u:4164: na kārakam upalabhate na vedakam upalabhate na jānakam upalabhate na paśyakam upalabhate.
K02sspp2_4u:4276: na hi prajñāpāramitopalambhayogena pratyupasthitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4277: tathā hi tasyāḥ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate yenopalabhet yad vopapalabhet yatra vopalabhet.
K02sspp2_4u:4281: yathā hi tad dīrgharātrau bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sa bodhim api nopalabhhate prāg eva buddhaṃ prāg eva buddhadharmān.
K02sspp2_4u:4282: śakra āha: punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na tadanyāsu pāramitāsu.
K02sspp2_4u:4284: sarvāsu kauśika ṣaḍpāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati tac cānupalambhayogena. sa dānam api nopalabhate dāyakam api nopalabhate pratigrāhakam api nopalabhate,
K02sspp2_4u:4285: śīlam api nopalabhate śīlavantam api nopalabhate dauḥśīlam api nopalabhate,
K02sspp2_4u:4286: kṣāntim api nopalabhate kṣamīnam api nopalabhate vyāpādam api nopalabhate,
K02sspp2_4u:4287: vīryam api nopalabhate vīryavantam api nopalabhate kauśīdyam api nopalabhate,
K02sspp2_4u:4288: dhyānam api nopalabhate dhyāyinam api nopalabhate vikṣepam api nopalabhate,
K02sspp2_4u:4289: prajñām api nopalabhate prajñāvantam api nopalabhate dauṣprajñam api nopalabhate.
K02sspp2_4u:4290: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadato dānapāramitāparipūraye,
K02sspp2_4u:4291: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ śīlapāramitāparipūraye,
K02sspp2_4u:4292: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntyā saṃpādāya kṣāntipāramitāparipūraye,
K02sspp2_4u:4293: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryam ālambhamānasya vīryapāramitāparipūraye,
K02sspp2_4u:4294: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya dhyānapāramitāparipūraye,
K02sspp2_4u:4295: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmān viviktataḥ prajñāpāramitāparipūraye sarvadharmānupalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_4u:4402: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ nānāpatrāṇāṃ nānāpuṣpāṇāṃ nānāphalānāṃ nānāsaṃkhyānāṃ nānārohapariṇāhānāṃ teṣāṃ chāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate,
K02sspp2_4u:4403: anyatra cchāyā cchāyety evaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti. evam eva kauśika pañcānāṃ (ŚsP_II-4_122)
K02sspp2_4u:4404: pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītānāṃ sarvajñajñānapariṇāmitānāṃ ca viśeṣo nānākraṇaṃ vopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_4u:4408: bhagavan prajñāpāramitā aparyavasānaguṇasamanvāgatayā tayā hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro
K02sspp2_4u:4409: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayet tāś ca
K02sspp2_4u:4410: satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś
K02sspp2_4u:4411: cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair uttare ca yathopadiṣṭāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4412: prajñāpāramitāṃ yoniśo manasikuryād yo 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4413: pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt kataras tayor bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K02sspp2_4u:4415: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra paripakṣyāmi,
K02sspp2_4u:4416: yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuru. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:4417: kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:4418: pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:4420: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ parasmai dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt so 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
K02sspp2_4u:4421: tat sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ gṛhītvā satkuyād gurukruyāt mānayet pūjayet
K02sspp2_4u:4422: puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
K02sspp2_4u:4425: śakra āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavatā bhāṣitasvārtham ājānāmi,
K02sspp2_4u:4426: yo yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:4427: pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhavajaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:4429: yo 'pi parasmai sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ dadyād ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:4431: tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vajropamaṃ samādhiḥ samāpadyaḥ vajropamam ātmabhāvaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4432: bhittvā tathāgataśarīrāṇy adhiṣṭhitāni mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanayya sattvakāye tathāgatadhātuvainayikānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4434: ye hi kecid bhagavan tathagatasyāntasaḥ sarṣapaphalamātraṃ dhātuṃ pūjayiṣyanti vividhābhiḥ pūjābhiḥ sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam (ŚsP_II-4_123)
K02sspp2_4u:4438: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4439: kṛtvā satkuryād gurukruyād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś
K02sspp2_4u:4440: cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4441: parasmai likhitvā dadyād dharmaprītyā ayaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:4443: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathopadiṣṭā
K02sspp2_4u:4444: parebhyo gatvā ācakṣīt deśayet saṃprakāśayet vicaret vibhajet uttānīkuryād ayaṃ sa
K02sspp2_4u:4445: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ pūrvakānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāñ cāntikād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:4446: śāstaiva saṃpratikāṅkṣitavyānyatarānyatarīyā gurusthānīyā vijñāḥ sabrahmacārī. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4447: eṣa evātra kauśika śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā na hy anyaḥ śāstānyā prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitaiva śāstā śāstaiḥ prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya
K02sspp2_4u:4448: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4449: ye 'pi te vijñāḥ sabrahmacāriṇas te 'pi nānye anyatrāvaivartikabodhisattvebhyo yatra
K02sspp2_4u:4451: 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca. atra hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śrāvakayānikā api śikṣitvā
K02sspp2_4u:4456: pratyekabuddhayānikā api śikṣitvā pratyekabodhin abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃvuddhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4457: bodhisattvā api mahāsattvāḥ śikṣitvā bodhisattvaniyamam avakrāntā avakrāmanti avakrāmiṣyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4458: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhānte abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:4459: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā tathāgatān arhataḥ sayakṣaṃbuddhānāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4460: mukhaṃ satkartukāmair gurukartukāmair mānayitukāmaiḥ pūjayitukāmaiḥ puṣpair mālyair
K02sspp2_4u:4461: gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair
K02sspp2_4u:4462: iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyāḥ puṣpair (ŚsP_II-4_124)
K02sspp2_4u:4463: mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair imaṃ cārthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyaitad abhūt,
K02sspp2_4u:4464: katamad ahaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya vihareyaṃ so 'haṃ kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:4465: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyām
K02sspp2_4u:4466: ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ cādhikaṃ vā na samanupaśyāmi,
K02sspp2_4u:4468: ya nv eva mayā dharmābhisaṃbuddhaḥ śāntaḥ praṇītas tam eva dharmaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya
K02sspp2_4u:4469: mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya vihareyaṃ katamaś cāsau kauśika dharmā yad uta saiva
K02sspp2_4u:4470: prajñāpāramitā aham eva tāvat kauśikemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkaromi gurukaromi mānayāmi
K02sspp2_4u:4471: pūjayāmi satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya viharāmi,
K02sspp2_4u:4472: kim aṅga punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmeneyaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4473: prajñāpāramitā na satkartavyā na gurukartavyā na mānayitavyā na pūjayitavyā puṣpair
K02sspp2_4u:4474: mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:4475: śrāvakayānikair vā kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā pratyekabudhayānikair
K02sspp2_4u:4476: api kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā
K02sspp2_4u:4477: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
K02sspp2_4u:4478: dhavajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4479: prajñāpāramitā niryātā hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniryātāś ca tathāgatā
K02sspp2_4u:4480: arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tathāgataniryātāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tasmāt tarhi kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:4481: bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā śrāvakayānikaiś ca pratyekabuddhayanikaiś
K02sspp2_4u:4482: ca kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā
K02sspp2_4u:4483: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
K02sspp2_4u:4484: dhavajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś
K02sspp2_4u:4485: cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyante 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca śrāvakayānikāś
K02sspp2_4u:4486: cārhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca pratyekabuddhayānīkāś ca pratyekabodhiṃ
K02sspp2_4u:4490: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayeta:
K02sspp2_4u:4491: sacet kauśika jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:4492: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānāṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:4493: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K02sspp2_4u:4495: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt paṭhanāya vā likhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4496: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntāś cāvakramanti ca avakramiṣyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4497: srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4498: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4499: anagāmiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4500: arhattvaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4501: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4502: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃprasthitā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntāś cāvakramanti cāvakramiṣyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4504: katame ca te kauśika sāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4505: yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry
K02sspp2_4u:4524: aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:4525: ime te kauśika anāsravā dharmā ye prajñāpāramitayā nirdiṣṭā yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:4526: kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāś cābhisaṃbudhyante cābhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4527: evaṃ kauśikaikaṃ sattvaṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpya kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā (ŚsP_II-4_126)
K02sspp2_4u:4529: na tv eva jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4530: daśasu kauśika kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ sattvā aparimuktā evaṃ narakatiryagyoner
K02sspp2_4u:4531: yamalokān srotaāpattiphale kauśika sattvaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ parimukto narakatiryagyoner yamalokān,
K02sspp2_4u:4532: kaḥ punar vādaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet,
K02sspp2_4u:4533: yaś ca punaḥ kauśika sarvajāmbūdvīpakān sattvān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed arhattve
K02sspp2_4u:4534: yaś caikaṃ sattvaṃ pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:4535: yo vā kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarvajāmbūdvīpakān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed
K02sspp2_4u:4536: yaś ca kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekam api sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K02sspp2_4u:4537: pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4539: ya ekasattvam apy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4540: bodhisattvanirjātā hi kauśika srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā
K02sspp2_4u:4541: bodhisattvaniryātā hi kauśika tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tad anena kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:4542: paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam. bodhisattvo 'pi pūjayitavyo mānayitavyaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:4543: puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
K02sspp2_4u:4545: sa devakena lokena samārakena saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:4546: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladhitā vā jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:4547: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:4550: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:4552: paṭhanāya vā likhanāya vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4553: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitva samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4560: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntā avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4562: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramita dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
K02sspp2_4u:4586: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry aryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:4589: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:4590: tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:4591: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
K02sspp2_4u:4592: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4593: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:4617: bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante. abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:4621: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:4687: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā (ŚsP_II-4_129)
K02sspp2_4u:4688: vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:4689: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:4692: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:4694: paṭhanāya vā Iekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4695: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caśikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrānto avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4700: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4701: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:4702: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
K02sspp2_4u:4703: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:4728: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:4730: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:4731: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:4732: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
K02sspp2_4u:4733: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4735: vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:4764: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:4830: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:4831: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro yā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:4834: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:4836: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4837: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
K02sspp2_4u:4843: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4844: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:4845: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
K02sspp2_4u:4846: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:4871: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:4873: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:4874: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:4875: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
K02sspp2_4u:4876: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4877: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:4906: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:4973: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sahasracūḍikā lokadhātuḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau
K02sspp2_4u:4974: sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet.
K02sspp2_4u:4975: tat kiṃ manyase kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:4976: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K02sspp2_4u:4978: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:4979: yo syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt,
K02sspp2_4u:4980: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vacanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:4982: kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
K02sspp2_4u:4988: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4989: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:4990: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
K02sspp2_4u:4991: katame ca te kauśikānāsrava dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:5016: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvaviharasamāpattayaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:5018: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:5020: anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:5021: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt. paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
K02sspp2_4u:5022: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:5023: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5053: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5119: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre
K02sspp2_4u:5120: lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu
K02sspp2_4u:5122: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:5125: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:5127: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:5128: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,

K02sspp2_4u:5162: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvary āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:5164: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:5165: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:5166: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
K02sspp2_4u:5167: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:5168: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5197: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5264: yāvantaḥ kauśika daśaṣu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśe gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāns
K02sspp2_4u:5265: tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpyet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:5266: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhutā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.

K02sspp2_4u:5271: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?

K02sspp2_4u:5309: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:5310: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
K02sspp2_4u:5311: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:5312: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5343: vijñānāntyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante ākiñcanyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5407: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye kecij jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladhitā
K02sspp2_4u:5408: vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturṣv apramāṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu
K02sspp2_4u:5410: pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭchāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:5411: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:5414: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:5416: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:5417: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:5422: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:5423: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntā avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:5425: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
K02sspp2_4u:5449: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:5452: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā nopadiṣṭāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:5453: tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:5454: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
K02sspp2_4u:5455: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:5456: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5486: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5552: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāṃbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau
K02sspp2_4u:5553: sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec
K02sspp2_4u:5554: caturṣv apramāṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpttiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet pañcasv
K02sspp2_4u:5556: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:5559: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:5561: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:5562: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrānto avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:5567: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:5568: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:5569: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
K02sspp2_4u:5570: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:5595: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:5597: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:5598: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:5599: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
K02sspp2_4u:5600: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:5601: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5630: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5697: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre lokadhātau
K02sspp2_4u:5698: sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro yā kuladuhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec
K02sspp2_4u:5699: caturṣv apramāṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpttiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet pañcasv
K02sspp2_4u:5701: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:5704: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:5706: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:5709: yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:5714: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:5715: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakraṃiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:5716: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
K02sspp2_4u:5717: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:5742: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:5744: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddbadharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:5745: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:5746: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyapi vācanāyāpi,
K02sspp2_4u:5747: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:5748: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5844: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre lokadhātau
K02sspp2_4u:5845: sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladtihitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec
K02sspp2_4u:5846: caturḥv apramāṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpttiṣu pratiṣṭhapayet pañcasv
K02sspp2_4u:5848: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:5851: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:5852: yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ likhitvā parebhyo dadyāt,
K02sspp2_4u:5853: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:5854: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:5855: yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
K02sspp2_4u:5861: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:5862: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:5863: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:5864: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:5889: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ (ŚsP_II-4_149)
K02sspp2_4u:5890: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:5891: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharma vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:5892: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
K02sspp2_4u:5893: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:5895: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5924: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:5991: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasre lokadhātau sattvā yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre
K02sspp2_4u:5992: lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec
K02sspp2_4u:5993: caturṣv apramāṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpttiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet pañcasv
K02sspp2_4u:5995: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:5998: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:6000: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:6001: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:6002: yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
K02sspp2_4u:6004: srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca. sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, (ŚsP_II-4_151)
K02sspp2_4u:6007: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:6008: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:6009: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:6010: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:6035: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:6039: anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:6040: veditavyam. yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo
K02sspp2_4u:6042: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:6043: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:6072: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,

K02sspp2_4u:6140: pratiṣṭhāpayec catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpttiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:6141: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:6144: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ likhitāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt,

K02sspp2_4u:6426: catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:6427: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:6430: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ (ŚsP_II-4_158)
K02sspp2_4u:6431: puṇyaṃ prasavet. yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt,
K02sspp2_4u:6432: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:6433: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
K02sspp2_4u:6439: pratyekabuddhayanikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:6440: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:6441: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:6442: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:6467: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ

K02sspp2_4u:6471: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi. ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:6472: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
