K02sspp2_4u:7334: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
K02sspp2_4u:7335: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:7336: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:7365: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:7432: yāvantaḥ kauśika upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid
K02sspp2_4u:7433: eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec caturṣv apramāṇeṣu
K02sspp2_4u:7434: catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:7435: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:7438: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt,
K02sspp2_4u:7439: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:7440: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
K02sspp2_4u:7446: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
K02sspp2_4u:7447: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7448: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:7449: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:7474: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:7476: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:7477: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02sspp2_4u:7478: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
K02sspp2_4u:7479: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:7480: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:7509: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K02sspp2_4u:7575: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7578: na tv eva jāmbūdvīpakān manuṣyān daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu (ŚsP_II-4_177)
K02sspp2_4u:7580: na tv eva cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sarvasattvān daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturḥv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpya,
K02sspp2_4u:7581: na tv eva sāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya,
K02sspp2_4u:7582: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpya,
K02sspp2_4u:7583: na tv eva dvisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya,
K02sspp2_4u:7584: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpya,
K02sspp2_4u:7585: na tv eva trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya,
K02sspp2_4u:7586: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpya,
K02sspp2_4u:7588: yan na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7589: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvyacaritayā dhyānapāramitām udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7590: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā vīryapāramitām udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati ādhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7591: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvyacaritayā kṣāntipāramitām udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati ādhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7592: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā śīlapāramitām udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati ādhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7593: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvyacaritayā dānapāramitām udgrahīṣyati paryavāpsyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:7594: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7595: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7596: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7597: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7598: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā mahāśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7601: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7602: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7603: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā atyantasunyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7604: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā anavarāgraśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7605: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā anavakāraśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7606: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7607: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7608: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7609: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā anupalambhaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7610: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā abhāvaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7611: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7612: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:7613: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā smṛtyupasthānani yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7614: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā samyakprahāṇāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7615: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā ṛddhipādāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7616: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā indriyāṇi yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7617: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā balāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7618: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā bodhyaṅgāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7619: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā āryāṣtāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7620: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā āryasatyāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7621: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā dhyānāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7622: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā apramāṇāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7623: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā ārūpyasamāpattīr yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7624: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā aṣṭau vimokṣān yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7625: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7626: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7627: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā abhijñāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7628: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā samādhīn yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7631: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā tathāgatabalāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7632: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā vaiśāradyāni yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7633: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā pratisaṃvido yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7634: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā mahākaruṇāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7635: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā āveṇikabuddhadharmān yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7636: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā sarvajñatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7637: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā mārgākārajñatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7638: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā sarvākārajñatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:7639: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anena paryāyeṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7640: parebhyo vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prakāśayiṣyati prabhāvayiṣyati vivariṣyati
K02sspp2_4u:7644: na prajñāpāramitādvayeṇa draṣṭavyā na dvayena na nimittato nāyuhato nāniryūhataḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:7646: na saṃkreśato na vyavadānato notpādato na nirodhataḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:7647: na grahato nāgrahato nodgrahato notsargato na sthānato nāsthānato na bhūtato nābhūtataḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:7648: na yogato nāyogato na śleṣmato nāśleṣmato na pratyayato nāpratyayato na dharmato nādharmataḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:7649: na tathāgatato nātathāgatato na bhūtakoṭīto nābhūtakoṭītaḥ. ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:7650: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ parebhyo vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prakāśayiṣyati vicariṣyati bhajiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7653: na tv eva ya ātmanaikopagṛhīyāt paryavāpnuyād ādhārayed dhārayed vācayed yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt.
K02sspp2_4u:7655: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svayaṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati
K02sspp2_4u:7656: paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati tāṃ ca parasmai vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati
K02sspp2_4u:7658: utttanīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati. arthaṃ cāsya upadekṣyaty ayam eva sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:7659: śakra āha: evaṃ khalu bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitopadiṣṭavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:7662: evaṃ khlu kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā sārthā
K02sspp2_4u:7663: savyañjanā. evam upadiśan punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāmānena
K02sspp2_4u:7665: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pūrvasyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7666: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryān mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:7667: pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
K02sspp2_4u:7668: vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām
K02sspp2_4u:7669: anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthaṃ savyañjanam ācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayed
K02sspp2_4u:7670: vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt prakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7672: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:7673: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7674: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryād gurukuryād
K02sspp2_4u:7675: mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:7676: patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K02sspp2_4u:7677: vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd
K02sspp2_4u:7678: deśayed prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro
K02sspp2_4u:7679: vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:7680: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:7681: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā paścimāyāṃ diśy aprameyāsakhyeyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7682: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryān mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:7683: pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
K02sspp2_4u:7684: vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām
K02sspp2_4u:7685: anekaparyayeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayed
K02sspp2_4u:7686: vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt prakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7688: hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:7689: samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:7690: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā uttarasyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7691: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryād gurukuryād
K02sspp2_4u:7692: mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:7693: patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K02sspp2_4u:7694: vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd
K02sspp2_4u:7695: deśayed prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro
K02sspp2_4u:7696: vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:7697: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:7698: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7699: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jivaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryān mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:7700: pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
K02sspp2_4u:7701: vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām
K02sspp2_4u:7702: anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣid deśayet prakāśayed
K02sspp2_4u:7703: vicared vibhajed uttanīkuryāt prakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7705: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:7706: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7707: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryād gurukuryān
K02sspp2_4u:7708: mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:7709: patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K02sspp2_4u:7710: vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd
K02sspp2_4u:7711: deśayed prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro
K02sspp2_4u:7714: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:7715: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7716: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryān mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:7717: pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
K02sspp2_4u:7718: vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām
K02sspp2_4u:7719: anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayed
K02sspp2_4u:7720: vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt prakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7722: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:7723: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā paścimottarasyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7724: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryād gurukuryād
K02sspp2_4u:7725: mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:7726: patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K02sspp2_4u:7727: vemāṃ prajmpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd
K02sspp2_4u:7728: deśayed prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro
K02sspp2_4u:7729: vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ punyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:7730: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhoteyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:7731: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā adhastād diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7732: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryān mānayet
K02sspp2_4u:7733: pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
K02sspp2_4u:7734: vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām
K02sspp2_4u:7735: anekaparyayeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayed
K02sspp2_4u:7736: vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt prakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7738: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ (ŚsP_II-4_183)
K02sspp2_4u:7739: samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:7740: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā upariṣṭād diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:7741: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryād gurukuryān
K02sspp2_4u:7742: mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
K02sspp2_4u:7743: patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K02sspp2_4u:7744: vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthāṃ savyañjanām ācakṣīd
K02sspp2_4u:7745: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro
K02sspp2_4u:7746: vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:7747: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
K02sspp2_4u:7749: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān dānapāramitāyāṃ carann upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_4u:7755: yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parasmai vistareṇācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayet prajñāpayet prasthāpayed vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet tac cānupalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_4u:7756: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:7758: dānaṃ datata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi idaṃ dānaṃ dadāmy asmai dānaṃ dadāmi tasyaivaṃ dānaṃ dadato dānam eva sthāsyati na dānapāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:7759: śīlaṃ rakṣata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣāmīdaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣāmi tasyaivaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ śīlam eva sthāsyati na śīlapāramitā upalabhayogena,
K02sspp2_4u:7760: kṣāntiṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ kṣāntibhāvayāmīmāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayāmi,
K02sspp2_4u:7761: tasyaivaṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayataḥ kṣāntir eva sthāsyati na kṣāntipāramitām upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_4u:7762: vīryam ārabhamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryam ārabhe asyārthāya vīryam ārabhe tasyaivaṃ vīryam ārabhamānasya vīryam eva sthāsyati na vīryapāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:7764: dhyānāni samāpadyamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni samāpadya imāni dhyānāni samāpadyetasyaivaṃ dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya dhyānāny eva sthāsyati na dhyānapāramitā upalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_4u:7765: prajñāṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmīmāṃ bhāvayāmi tasyaivaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayataḥ prajñaiva sthāsyati na prajñāpāramitā upalambhayogena.
K02sspp2_4u:7766: evaṃ khalu kauśikopalambhacaritasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na dānapāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:7767: paripūryate na śīlapāramitā paripūryate na kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate na vīryapāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:7768: paripūryate na dhyānapāramitā paripūryate na prajñāpāramitā paripūryate.
K02sspp2_4u:7769: śakra āha: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate?
K02sspp2_4u:7770: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā paripūryate?
K02sspp2_4u:7771: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate?
K02sspp2_4u:7772: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā paripūryate?
K02sspp2_4u:7773: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā paripūryate?
K02sspp2_4u:7774: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā paripūryate?
K02sspp2_4u:7776: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadat na dāyakam upalabhate na dānaṃ pratigrāhakam upalabhate,
K02sspp2_4u:7777: na śīlaṃ rakṣan na śīlaṃ na śīlasamādānam upalabhate,
K02sspp2_4u:7778: na kṣāntiṃ bhāvayan na kṣāntiṃ rakṣanti bhāvanām upalabhate,
K02sspp2_4u:7779: na vīryam ārabhamāṇe na vīryāraṃbham upalabhate,
K02sspp2_4u:7782: evaṃ carataḥ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate śīlapāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:7783: paripūryate kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate vīryapāramitā paripūryate dhyānapāramitā paripūryate
K02sspp2_4u:7785: evaṃ khalu kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā abudhyamānasya prajñāpāramitā sārthā savyañjanām upadeṣṭavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:7786: evam abudhyamānasya dhyānapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:7787: evam abudhyamānasya vīryapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:7788: evam abudhyamānasya kṣāntipāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:7789: evam abudhyamānasya śīlapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
K02sspp2_4u:7791: dānapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:7792: bhaviṣyanti kauśikānāgate 'dhvani kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca ye bodhisattvayānikebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7793: tatra ca kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarā yaiḥ samyaksaṃbodhir ye saṃprasthitā bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:7794: te tāṃ prativarṇikāṃ śrutvā mārgāṃ praṇakṣanti teṣām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sārthā savyañjanā vistareṇopadiṣṭavyā.
K02sspp2_4u:7796: śakra āha: katamā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikā?
K02sspp2_4u:7798: iha kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyāma iti,
K02sspp2_4u:7800: śakra āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro yā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti?
K02sspp2_4u:7802: iha kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśantaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:7805: yad uta rūpam anityam ity upadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7809: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7817: rūpam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7821: vedanām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
K02sspp2_4u:7829: vedanām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ vedanām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7833: saṃjñām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
K02sspp2_4u:7839: te saṃjñām anityeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ. saṃjñāṃ duḥkheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:7840: saṃjñām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ saṃjñām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7844: saṃskārān aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7845: ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti. yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7852: saṃskārān anātmāna iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ saṃskārān aśubhā iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7856: vijñānam aśubham ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7864: vijñānam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:7868: cakṣur aśubham ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7876: cakṣur aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7880: śrotram aśubham ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7883: śrotram anātmeti gaveṣiṣyante. śrotram aśubham iti (ŚsP_II-4_187)
K02sspp2_4u:7888: śrotram aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7892: ghrāṇam aśubham ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7900: ghrāṇam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7904: jihvām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7905: te jihvām anityeti gaveṣiṣyante jihvāṃ duḥkheti gaveṣiṣyante,
K02sspp2_4u:7915: kāyam aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7923: kāyam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7927: mano 'śubham ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7939: rūpam aśubham ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca (ŚsP_II-4_188)
K02sspp2_4u:7940: vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7948: rūpam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7952: śabdam aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7960: śabdam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7964: gandham aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7972: gandham aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7976: rasam aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7984: rasam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7988: sparśam aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:7997: sparśam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,

K02sspp2_4u:8682: sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8686: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caratīti,
K02sspp2_4u:8694: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8698: anupalambhaśūnyatām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
K02sspp2_4u:8706: anupalambhaśūnyatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ anupalambhasūnyatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8710: abhāvaśūnyatām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
K02sspp2_4u:8718: abhāvaśūnyatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ abhāvaśūnyatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8722: svabhāvaśūnyatām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
K02sspp2_4u:8730: svabhāvaśūnyatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ svabhāvaśūnyatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8734: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
K02sspp2_4u:8742: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:8747: smṛtyupasthānāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8760: samyakprahāṇāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8772: ṛddhipādān aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8784: indriyāṇy aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
K02sspp2_4u:8797: balāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8810: samyakprahāṇāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8822: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgam aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8830: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgam aśubha iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8834: āryasatyāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8846: dhyānāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8859: apramāṇāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8871: ārupyasamāpattīr aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8879: ārūpyasamāpattīr aśubhā iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8883: vimokṣān aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8895: anupūrvavihārasamāpattīr aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8904: anupūrvavihārasamāpattir aśubhā iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8908: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny aśubhanity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8920: abhijñā aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8928: abhijñā aśubhā iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8932: samādhīn aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8944: dhāraṇīmukhāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8956: tathāgatabalāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8968: vaiśāradyāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8980: pratisaṃvido 'śubhā ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:8993: mahākaruṇām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9005: āveṇikabuddhadharmān aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9018: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9026: srotaāpattiphalam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9031: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati (ŚsP_II-4_212)
K02sspp2_4u:9040: sakṛdāgāmiphalam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9045: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9053: anāgāmiphalam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9058: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9066: arhattvam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9070: pratyekabodhim aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
K02sspp2_4u:9078: pratyekabodhim anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ pratyekabodhim aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9082: mārgākārajñatām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
K02sspp2_4u:9090: mārgākārajñatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ mārgākārajñatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9095: sarvākārajñatām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
K02sspp2_4u:9103: sarvākārajñatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ sarvākārajñatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti. iyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā.
K02sspp2_4u:9105: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upaviśanti upadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9106: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9107: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9108: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
K02sspp2_4u:9109: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dhyānapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9110: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9111: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
K02sspp2_4u:9112: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra vīryapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9113: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9114: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
K02sspp2_4u:9115: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra kṣāntipāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau
K02sspp2_4u:9116: ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
K02sspp2_4u:9117: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra śīlapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9118: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9119: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
K02sspp2_4u:9120: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dānapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9121: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9122: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. taś ca nimittayogenopalambhayogena,
K02sspp2_4u:9123: sa kālasaṃjñayā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayiṣyati. iyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā.
K02sspp2_4u:9124: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9125: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sattvaṃ kulaputra prajñāīpāramitāṃ bhāvayan
K02sspp2_4u:9126: śrāvakabhūmiṃ samatikramiṣyasi pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ samatikramiṣyasi. iyaṃ kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:9128: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9129: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan bodhisattvanyāmam avakramiṣyāmy anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilapsyase,
K02sspp2_4u:9130: sattvam anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilabhya bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthitvā buddhakṣetrād
K02sspp2_4u:9131: buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyasi tāṃ tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvan gurukurvan
K02sspp2_4u:9132: mānayan pūjayan naivam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9133: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9134: yaḥ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
K02sspp2_4u:9135: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati so 'prameyam asaṃkhyeyam aparimāṇaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:9136: evam upadiśantas teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9137: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9138: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputrātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām
K02sspp2_4u:9140: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yat kuśalamūlaṃ tat prathamacittotpādam upādāyaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:9141: yāvad anupādhiśeṣāṃ nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāṃ tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipyānumodyānuttarāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9142: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya evam upadiśantas te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9144: śakra āha: katham upadiśanto bhagavaṃs te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām
K02sspp2_4u:9146: iha kauśika kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9147: caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā
K02sspp2_4u:9148: ca rūpam anityam iti samanupaśyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9149: rūpaṃ svabhāvaśūnyaṃ yo rūpasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhūvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyā prajñāpāramitā na tatra rūpaṃ nitya iti vā anityam iti copalabhyate,
K02sspp2_4u:9150: rūpam eva na saṃvidyate nopalabhate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bbaviṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9151: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9152: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9153: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca vedanām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9154: vedanāsvabhāvena śūnyāyā vedanāyāḥ svabhāva so 'bhāvo yo bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:9155: tatra na vedanā nityeti copalabhyate. vedanaiva tatra na samvidyate nopalabhyate
K02sspp2_4u:9156: kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9158: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9159: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9160: bhāvaya mā ca saṃjñām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9161: saṃjñāsvabhāvena śūnyāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9162: prajñāpāramitā na tatra saṃjñā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. saṃjñaiva tatra
K02sspp2_4u:9163: na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vābhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:9164: te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.

K02sspp2_4u:9167: bhāvaya mā ca saṃskārān anityā iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9168: saṃskārāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvā yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ

K02sspp2_4u:9297: bhāvaya mā ca manovijñānam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?

K02sspp2_4u:9299: tatra na manovijñānaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. manovijñānam eva tatra
K02sspp2_4u:9300: na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika

K02sspp2_4u:9376: bhāvaya mā ca kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9377: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā svabhāvena śūnyā yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,

K02sspp2_4u:9388: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9389: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9390: bhāvaya mā ca pṛthivīdhātum anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9391: pṛthivīdhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yaḥ pṛthivīdhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:9392: tatra na pṛthivīdhātuḥ nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. pṛthivīdhātur eva tatra
K02sspp2_4u:9393: na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:9394: te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9395: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām (ŚsP_II-4_225)
K02sspp2_4u:9396: upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā cābdhātum anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9397: abdhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yo 'bdhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhavaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:9398: tatra nābdhātur nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. abdhātur eva tatra na saṃvidyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9399: kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā
K02sspp2_4u:9400: vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9401: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ

K02sspp2_4u:9403: bhāvaya mā ca tejodhātum anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9404: tejodhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yas tejodhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:9405: tatra na tejodhātuḥ nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. tejodhātur eva tatra na
K02sspp2_4u:9406: saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te

K02sspp2_4u:9411: vāyudhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yo vāyudhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:9412: tatra na vāyudhātur nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. vāyudhātur eva tatra na
K02sspp2_4u:9413: saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te
K02sspp2_4u:9414: kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9415: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9416: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9417: bhāvaya mā cākāśadhātum anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9418: ākāśadhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo ya ākāśadhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:9419: tatra nākāśadhātur nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. ākāśadhātur eva tatra na
K02sspp2_4u:9420: saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te
K02sspp2_4u:9421: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9422: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9423: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9424: bhāvaya mā ca vijñānadhātum anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9425: vijñānadhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yo vijñānadhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:9426: tatra na vijñānadhātur nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. vijñānadhātur eva tatra
K02sspp2_4u:9427: na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:9428: te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9430: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9431: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9432: bhāvaya mā cāvidyām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9433: avidyā svabhāvena śūnyā yo vidyāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:9434: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra nāvidyā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. avidyaiva tatra
K02sspp2_4u:9435: na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:9436: te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9437: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9438: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9439: bhāvaya mā ca saṃskārān anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9440: saṃskārāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhavā yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:9441: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na saṃskārānityā iti vā anityāiti vopalabhyate. saṃskārā
K02sspp2_4u:9442: eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9443: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9444: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9445: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9446: bhāvaya mā ca vijñānam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9447: vijñānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yo vijñānasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:9448: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na vijñānaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. vijñānam
K02sspp2_4u:9449: eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā (ŚsP_II-4_227)
K02sspp2_4u:9450: bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9451: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9452: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9453: bhāvaya mā ca nāmarūpam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9454: nāmarūpaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yo nāmarūpasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:9455: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na nāmarūpaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. nāmarūpam
K02sspp2_4u:9456: eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9457: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9458: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9459: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9460: bhāvaya mā ca ṣaḍāyatanam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9461: ṣaḍāyatanaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā
K02sspp2_4u:9462: prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9463: ṣaḍāyatanam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:9464: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9465: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9466: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9467: bhāvaya mā ca sparśam anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9468: sparśasvabhāvena śūnyo yaḥ sparśasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:9469: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na sparśaṃ nitya iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. sparśam
K02sspp2_4u:9470: eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9471: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9472: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputraṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9473: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9474: bhāvaya mā ca vedanām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9475: vedanā svabhāvena śūnyā yā vedanāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā (ŚsP_II-4_228)
K02sspp2_4u:9476: tatra na vedanā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. vedanaiva tatra na saṃvidyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9477: kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā
K02sspp2_4u:9478: vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9479: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9480: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca tṛṣṇām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9481: tṛṣṇāsvabhāvena śūnyā yas tṛṣṇāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:9482: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na tṛṣṇā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. tṛṣṇaiva tatra
K02sspp2_4u:9483: na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:9484: te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9485: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9486: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā copādānam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9487: upādānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyo ya upādānasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyā
K02sspp2_4u:9488: prajñāpāramitā tatra nopādanaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. upādānam eva
K02sspp2_4u:9489: tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evaṃ upadiśantaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9490: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9491: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9492: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9493: bhāvaya mā ca bhavam anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9494: bhavaḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yo bhavasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyā prajñāpāramitā,
K02sspp2_4u:9495: tatra na bhavo nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. bhava eva tatra na saṃvidyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9496: kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā
K02sspp2_4u:9497: vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9498: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9499: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9500: bhāvaya mā ca jātim anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9502: svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na jātir
K02sspp2_4u:9503: nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. jātir eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo
K02sspp2_4u:9504: vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā
K02sspp2_4u:9506: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9507: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9508: bhāvaya mā ca jarāmaraṇam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9509: jarāmaraṇa svabhāvena śūnyo yo jarāmaraṇasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyā
K02sspp2_4u:9510: prajñāpāramitā tatra na jarāmaraṇaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. jarāmaraṇam
K02sspp2_4u:9511: eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9512: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9514: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9515: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9516: bhāvaya mā ca dānapāramitām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9517: dānapāramitā svabhāvena śūnyā yo dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā
K02sspp2_4u:9518: prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na dāṇapāramitā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9519: dānapāramitaiva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam
K02sspp2_4u:9520: upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9521: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9522: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9523: bhāvaya mā ca śīlapāramitām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9524: śīlapāramitā svabhāvena śūnyā yaḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9525: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na śīlapāramitā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9526: śīlapāramitaiva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam
K02sspp2_4u:9527: upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9528: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām (ŚsP_II-4_230)
K02sspp2_4u:9529: upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca kṣāntipāramitām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?

K02sspp2_4u:9532: kṣāntipāramitaiva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:9533: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.

K02sspp2_4u:9538: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na vīryapāramitā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9539: vīryapāramitaiva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati.

K02sspp2_4u:9543: bhāvaya ma ca dhyanapāramitām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9544: dhyānapāramitā svabhāvena śūnyā yo dhyānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9545: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na dhyānapāramitā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9546: dhyānapāramitaiva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:9547: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9548: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9549: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9550: bhāvaya mā ca prajñāpāramitām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9551: prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena śūnyā yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9552: sā prajñāpāramitāyā prajñāpāramitā tatra na prajñāpāramitā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9553: prajñāpāramitaiva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:9554: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.

K02sspp2_4u:9687: punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
K02sspp2_4u:9690: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputraḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ (ŚsP_II-4_236)
K02sspp2_4u:9691: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca smṛtyupasthānāny anityānīti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9692: smṛtyupasthānāni svabhāvena śūnyāni yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo
K02sspp2_4u:9693: 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na smṛtyupasthānāni nityānīti vā
K02sspp2_4u:9694: anityānīti vopalabhyate. smṛtyupasthānāny eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā
K02sspp2_4u:9695: vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā

K02sspp2_4u:9698: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ

K02sspp2_4u:9822: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9823: kuladuhitṝṇaṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9824: bhāvaya mā ca vaiśāradyāny anityānīti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9826: svabhāvena śūnyāni yo vaiśāradyānāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:9827: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na vaiśāradyāni nityānīti vā anityānīti vopalabhyate. vaiśāradyāny
K02sspp2_4u:9828: eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyanti. evam upadiśantaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9829: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9830: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānaṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9831: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9832: bhāvaya mā ca pratisaṃvido 'nityā iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9833: pratisaṃvidaḥ svabhāvena śūnyā yaḥ pratisaṃvidāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā
K02sspp2_4u:9834: prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na pratisaṃvido nityā iti vā anityā iti vopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9835: pratisaṃvida eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9836: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9837: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9838: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9839: bhāvaya mā ca mahākaruṇām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9840: mahākaruṇā svabhāvena śūnyā yo mahākaruṇāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:9841: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na mahākaruṇā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. mahākaruṇaiva
K02sspp2_4u:9842: tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9843: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9844: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhiisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9845: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9846: bhāvaya mā cāveṇikabuddhadharmān anityā iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9847: āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā ya āveṇikabuddhhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo
K02sspp2_4u:9848: yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra nāveṇikabuddhadharmā nityā iti
K02sspp2_4u:9849: vā anityā iti vopalabhyate. āveṇikabuddhadharmā eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar
K02sspp2_4u:9850: nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
K02sspp2_4u:9852: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputraḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ (ŚsP_II-4_242)
K02sspp2_4u:9853: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca srotaāpattiphalam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9854: srotaāpattiphalaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yaḥ srotaāpattiphalasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo
K02sspp2_4u:9855: 'bhavaḥ sā prajñāpāramita yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na srotaāpattiphalaṃ nityam iti
K02sspp2_4u:9856: vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. srotaāpattiphalam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar
K02sspp2_4u:9857: nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
K02sspp2_4u:9859: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputraḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayanikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9860: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9861: bhāvaya mā ca sakṛdāgāmiphalam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9862: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo
K02sspp2_4u:9863: 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramita yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nityam iti
K02sspp2_4u:9864: vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. sakṛdāgāmiphalam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar
K02sspp2_4u:9865: nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
K02sspp2_4u:9867: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9868: kuladuhitṝṇaṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9869: bhāvaya mā cānagāmiphalam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9870: anāgāmiphalaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yo 'nāgāmiphalasya svabhavaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhavaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9871: sā prajñāpāramita yā prajñāpāramitā tatra nānāgāmiphalaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti
K02sspp2_4u:9872: vopalabhyate. anāgāmiphalam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9873: vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9874: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9875: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9876: bhāvaya mā cārhattvam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9877: arhattvaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yo 'rhattvasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
K02sspp2_4u:9878: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra nārhattvaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. (ŚsP_II-4_243)
K02sspp2_4u:9879: anāgāmiphalam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:9880: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9881: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9882: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9883: bhāvaya mā ca pratyekabodhim anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9884: pratyekabodhiḥ svabhāvena śūnyā yaḥ pratyekabodheḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9885: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na pratyekabodhir nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9886: pratyekabodhir eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:9887: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9888: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikanāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9889: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9890: bhāvaya mā ca mārgākārajñatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9891: mārgākārajñatā svabhāvena śūnyā yo mārgākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9892: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na mārgākārajñatā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9893: mārgākārajñatā eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:9894: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9895: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9896: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9897: bhāvaya mā ca sarvākārajñatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9898: sarvākārajñatā svabhāvena śunyā yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:9899: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na sarvākārajñatā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
K02sspp2_4u:9900: sarvākārajñatā eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
K02sspp2_4u:9901: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K02sspp2_4u:9902: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayanikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti,
K02sspp2_4u:9903: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca kaṃ cid dharmaṃ samatikramiṣyasi sā kvacid dharme pratiṣṭhāsyati. tat kasya (ŚsP_II-4_244)
K02sspp2_4u:9904: hetoh? tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saddharmo na saṃvidyate yo dharmaḥ samatikramitavyo yatra vā pratiṣṭhātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9905: tathā hi kauśika sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvo na śūnyā yaś ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so
K02sspp2_4u:9906: 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na kaścid dharma āyūhitavyo
K02sspp2_4u:9907: vā niryūhitavyo vā utpādayitavyo vā nirodhayitavyo vā,
K02sspp2_4u:9908: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām
K02sspp2_4u:9909: upadekṣyanti. tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā
K02sspp2_4u:9910: artham upadeṣṭavyo evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9912: na tv eva te paurvakāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca.
K02sspp2_4u:9914: punar aparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvās tān kascid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:9915: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:9918: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
K02sspp2_4u:9919: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
K02sspp2_4u:9920: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ ca vaded ehi
K02sspp2_4u:9921: tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru
K02sspp2_4u:9922: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9923: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.
K02sspp2_4u:9924: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvipakāḥ sattvā yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:9925: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:9928: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
K02sspp2_4u:9929: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
K02sspp2_4u:9930: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ vadet. ehi tvaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:9931: kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru
K02sspp2_4u:9934: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.
K02sspp2_4u:9935: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:9936: yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K02sspp2_4u:9937: vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:9938: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:9941: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
K02sspp2_4u:9942: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
K02sspp2_4u:9943: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryat saṃprakāśayed evaṃ ca vadet. ehi
K02sspp2_4u:9944: tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru
K02sspp2_4u:9945: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9946: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.
K02sspp2_4u:9947: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:9948: yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro
K02sspp2_4u:9949: vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:9950: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:9953: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
K02sspp2_4u:9954: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
K02sspp2_4u:9955: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ ca vaded ehi
K02sspp2_4u:9956: tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru
K02sspp2_4u:9957: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9958: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.
K02sspp2_4u:9959: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
K02sspp2_4u:9960: yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro
K02sspp2_4u:9961: vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:9962: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:9965: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
K02sspp2_4u:9966: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ ca vaded ehi
K02sspp2_4u:9967: tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru
K02sspp2_4u:9968: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:9969: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.
K02sspp2_4u:9970: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.

K02sspp2_4u:10134: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvā arhattve pratiṣṭhāpitā yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid (ŚsP_II-4_252)
K02sspp2_4u:10135: eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:10136: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:10139: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K02sspp2_4u:10140: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
K02sspp2_4u:10141: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet. evaṃ ca vadet,
K02sspp2_4u:10142: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi ādhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetoḥ?

K02sspp2_4u:10146: vā arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02sspp2_4u:10147: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:10150: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,

K02sspp2_4u:10153: evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhy ādhāraya dhāraya
K02sspp2_4u:10154: vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:10155: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyā arhantaḥ prabhāvyante.
K02sspp2_4u:10156: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvā arhattve pratiṣṭhāpitāh.

K02sspp2_4u:10162: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,

K02sspp2_4u:10314: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
K02sspp2_4u:10315: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ ca vaded ehi
K02sspp2_4u:10316: tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhy ādhāraya dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś
K02sspp2_4u:10317: ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyaṃ pratipadyasva. yadā tvaṃ kulaputra

K02sspp2_4u:10324: yadā te prajñāpāramitā bhūyasyā mātrayā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gamiṣyati. tadā tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. tat kasya hetoḥ?

K02sspp2_4u:10331: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,

K02sspp2_4u:10341: yadā te prajñāpāramitā bhūyasyā mātrayā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gamiṣyati,
K02sspp2_4u:10342: tadā tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. tat kasya hetoḥ?

K02sspp2_4u:10374: tadā tvaṃ sarvajñatādharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyasi. yadā tvaṃ sarvajñatādharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyasi,

K02sspp2_4u:10376: yadā te prajñāpāramitā bhūyasyā mātrayā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gamiṣyati. tadā tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. tat kasya hetoḥ?
