K02sspp2_4u:10500: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhy ādhāraya dhāraya (ŚsP_II-4_264)
K02sspp2_4u:10501: vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. yadā tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipatsyase,
K02sspp2_4u:10506: tadā tvam anuttarāṃ samyakṣaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:10507: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitā,
K02sspp2_4u:10508: yāvantaḥ kauśika daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te sarva anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitā bhaveyus
K02sspp2_4u:10509: kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
K02sspp2_4u:10510: evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhy ādhāraya dhāraya
K02sspp2_4u:10511: vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. yadā
K02sspp2_4u:10512: tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipatsyase. tadā tvaṃ kulaputra
K02sspp2_4u:10516: yadā tvaṃ sarvajñatādharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyasi. tadā tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:10518: punar aparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur
K02sspp2_4u:10519: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyaś ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva
K02sspp2_4u:10520: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇopadiśed
K02sspp2_4u:10521: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
K02sspp2_4u:10522: tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kṣipraṃ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyeyam iti,
K02sspp2_4u:10523: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet. imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed,
K02sspp2_4u:10524: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:10525: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvantaḥ kauśika
K02sspp2_4u:10526: cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyaṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K02sspp2_4u:10527: tebhyo bodhisattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:10528: sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadised deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt
K02sspp2_4u:10529: saṃprakāśayet tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kṣipraṃ
K02sspp2_4u:10531: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistarenopadiśet,
K02sspp2_4u:10532: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
K02sspp2_4u:10533: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:10534: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K02sspp2_4u:10535: yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur
K02sspp2_4u:10536: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyaś ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva
K02sspp2_4u:10537: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed
K02sspp2_4u:10538: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ cānyataro bodhisattvo
K02sspp2_4u:10539: mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
K02sspp2_4u:10540: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
K02sspp2_4u:10541: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:10542: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K02sspp2_4u:10543: yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur
K02sspp2_4u:10544: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyaś ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva
K02sspp2_4u:10545: kulaputro vā kuladuhhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśet,
K02sspp2_4u:10546: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet. tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyam iti,
K02sspp2_4u:10547: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
K02sspp2_4u:10548: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:10549: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K02sspp2_4u:10550: yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur
K02sspp2_4u:10551: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K02sspp2_4u:10552: vā imāṃ prajñāpārāmitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared
K02sspp2_4u:10553: vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet. tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ
K02sspp2_4u:10554: ca vaded ehi kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
K02sspp2_4u:10555: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed,
K02sspp2_4u:10556: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K02sspp2_4u:10557: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K02sspp2_4u:10558: yāvantaḥ kauśika daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās
K02sspp2_4u:10559: te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyo bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:10560: kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ punyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:10561: avaivartikebhyo hi bodhisattvebhyo nānyārthaṃ dharmam upadeṣṭavyo niyatā hi te saṃbodhi
K02sspp2_4u:10562: parāyaṇānate bhuyo vivartittite anuttarāyā samyaksaṃbodher ayam abhū kaścic citaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:10565: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K02sspp2_4u:10566: yathā yathā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttārāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyām avavaditavyo
K02sspp2_4u:10572: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā adhyātmaśūnyatāyām avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:10591: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā smṛtyupasthāneṣv avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:10615: te khalu punar bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmasaṃgrahaś cāmiṣasaṃgraheṇaṃ cānuś cānugṛhūnto
K02sspp2_4u:10616: bahutaraṃ te kulaputra kuladuhitaraś ca puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyanti. na tv eva te paurvakāḥ
K02sspp2_4u:10617: kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K02sspp2_4u:10667: athāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate:
K02sspp2_4u:10668: sādhu sādhu kauśika yas tvaṃ bodhisattvebhyā utsāhaṃ dadāsi bodhisattvānām ugṛhīṣve anupārayasi,
K02sspp2_4u:10669: evam eṣa tvayā kauśika karaṇīyaṃ ya āryaśrāvakaḥ sattvānām anugrahaṃ kartukāmaḥ sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām (ŚsP_II-4_269)
K02sspp2_4u:10670: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv utsāhaṃ dadhātu dharmām iṣānugraheṇa ca bodhisattvān anugṛhātv anuparipārayatu. tat kasya hetoh?
K02sspp2_4u:10671: ataḥ prasabohi kauśika bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghāḥ yad uta bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ
K02sspp2_4u:10672: yadi ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittan notpādayan na
K02sspp2_4u:10673: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣeta ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:10716: nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ na pratyekabuddhā prajñāparan na śrāvakāḥ,
K02sspp2_4u:10717: yasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu danapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
K02sspp2_4u:10760: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaiḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu naraka ucchidyante tiryagyoni ucchidyante yamaloka ucchidyante,
K02sspp2_4u:10761: āsurāś ca kāyā parihīyante divyāṃs ca kāyā abhivartante,
K02sspp2_4u:10811: anavakāraśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati prakṛtiśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
K02sspp2_4u:10840: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
